story:
This picture book allows readers to take a step forward!

Tuntun will give you the opportunity to have a conversation with your kids about inclusion, fear of the unknown, extinction and African wildlife conservation. On our website you will learn more than the sound of your favorite wild animals together, right after having a wonderful encounter with the animals while enjoying a fun-filled story about a giant pink elephant.

We believe children can change the world. The future of African wild animals will be different if we raise men and women more aware of their impact in the world. 

Kids love animals, and they also love stories about bravery in which the underdog finds a way to overcome his problems. Add a few splashes of silliness and a fast-paced jaunt through the jungle, and you’ve got the makings of an unforgettable tale featuring a remarkable elephant named Tuntun.

This giant pink elephant has no idea how huge he is. By extension, Tuntun doesn’t realize that the sound of his footsteps is scaring away all the other animals in the jungle! All he knows is that he’s lonesome and can’t find anyone to play with. How can this dilemma be solved? Well, a sympathetic wasp takes action in an unexpected way, causing an accident that completely changes the jungle and things are never the same again!

Tuntun highlights the important topics of inclusion and bravery, reminding readers that, often, things are not as they seem. By the end of this colorful story, kids discover that almost all the African wild animals they’ve just met are endangered or threatened. The book then promotes wildlife conservation by inviting readers to learn about African wild animals that are in trouble on a website: www.tuntun.co.

At www.tuntun.co kids will learn, in a fun way, about all wild animals that are in trouble in Africa, with an animated version of our book, interesting facts about the animals, games, coloring pages, worksheets and real pictures for parents and teachers to use. 

We want kids to understand what’s really happening with wild animals today, showing them,

we can make it better together.

We have partner with Reteti: http://retetielephants.org, the first community sanctuary in Africa. On our website we'll have information about what they do specially written for children. We want them to know there are ways to help, and there will be a direct link so families can donate.

Anya Damiron, from the Dominican Republic, is the award-winning children's book author of Tuntun and Pablo Pino, from Argentina, is the illustrator. 

After the story was written, Pablo worked on the illustrations for months. When it was ready, Anya made a sample of the book and traveled to the Guadalajara Bookfair to present Tuntun to some publishers, hoping to get it published this year, along with this interesting project. 

Algar editorial, a publisher that makes wonderful picture books from Spain, was interested in our book and a few weeks later, decided to work with us :)

Tuntun will be published this fall by Algar, Bromera and Animallibres in 4 languages.

Now its all set in motion. We are working on interactive activities for all the family to share while learning, on our website, and we need your help.

PRE-Buy our book and be part of this project! 

We're not alone, all this collaborators are working together to make www.tuntun.co possible and we also have the support of a few local sponsors. 

 

To help promote this project, the book and our purpose of motivating others to learn about African wildlife conservation, we created the social impact movement: "Mas que un Sonido". ("More than a Sound" )

A big group of artists, influencers, journalists, communicators, families, chefs, friends and many more supporters from different areas of the Dominican Republic, are joining this campaign to help us promote inclusion and wildlife conservation through their social networks, inviting their followers to find out what we're doing with a ROAR.

Thank you all for your support!

YOU can support us too!

We are basically half way there and NOW we need your help.

¡Pre-buy our book or donate to help us create this project!

This is something you’ll be able to enjoy with your kids, on your phone, tv, tablet or desktop computer anytime you want. 

Anya writes, produces, story-tells, rents and sells picture books. She began her career as a writer in 2008 by launching a collection of picture books that motivates children to be curious, to dream, to invent and to use their imagination. Since then, he has continued to write and publish her books independently in the Dominican Republic.

Over time, she started creating social impact projects around picture books and began storytelling, having presentations every weekend in several malls of her country, achieving a positive change in her community. The last book she published: "SuperKids", won five international book awards including best website of a book twice with www.youaresuper.co, and a new hardcover version of this book was just published in Europe.

​

Anya also promotes family reading by sharing and renting her big collection of picture books from other countries with her project Renta a Cuento and now she has a big book corner full of books, curated by her, where families can go read together for free.

Our book will be publish on October 2018 and we are already working on everything that will be on our website. You will only have to wait a month to receive and enjoy Tuntun. 

 

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make some noise about our campaign sharing it with your friends.
  • Follow us on our social media.

story:
Short Summary

Hey, I'm Jenn Hayward, comedian, mom, social justice diva, mental health patient, wife.  I have been in an on and off relationship with God (Jesus/Creator/miscellaneous) my entire life.  I wrote a one woman play four years ago and performed to acclaim.  After each show I would have women come up to me and say "i have never experienced your life but I have felt like that as well." I received numerous emails from people asking for the show in book format, so, I said I'd have it ready in a year and three years later, here I am!

As a comic and creative talent there are many projects I could consider for crowdfunding, but this is the one that means the most.  This book will hopefully help some, make others laugh and gross a few men out.  By helping with this campaign you are helping tell the story of one crazy, horny feminist, helping not only myself and my family fulfill this dream and goal but also helping make a positive out of what was a trying and at times extremely painful life.  Maybe it will help others, maybe someone will read it and say "you know, what, maybe kids isn't for me" who knows, but we won't know until we get it in the hands of the masses!


What We Need & What You Get

I chose $5000 as I didn't want to be greedy, but also wanted to get enough to get the book into the hands of a solid marketer.  I can tweet and post on facebook as good as anyone, but apparently launching a book takes more than my mom "liking" my status.  (also I can bet my mom won't read this book, there is a lot of sex in it)

In addition to marketing, the money will also go to buy drugs and prostitutes.  Oops let the cat out of the bag!  Kidding, it is all going to marketing.  I have a make up brand ready to be part of it as well and will look for more sponsors.

There is also the availability to provide perks to contributors for advertising on The Jenn Hayward Show, another project of mine.

Even if I don't make the entire $5000 I will still use it all on marketing including something called SEO, a term I read on the interweb.

The Impact

The impact of your donation to me is creating a larger market for me to tell my story. This story is one worth telling.  While I certainly didn't try to kill myself in El Paso Texas 20 years ago followed by a roller coaster of a life just to write a book, I am proud I have been able to take the lessons I have learned, tell the story while entertaining others. 

The impact to others is that it might help them.  It might entertain them.  It might gross them out and it might help break the stigma surrounding mental health.

The following people will benefit and enjoy this book (aka my demographic):

-Feminists
-Non-Feminists
-Fellow Mètis/Ukranian crazy women from Saskatchewan
-Other people who are not Mètis, Ukranian or from Saskatchewan
-Roughrider fans!  SK
-Non-Roughrider fans.  I am kidding go screw yourself Winnipeg Bluebombers
-Actually this book has nothing to do with football
-Women, men, gay, lesbian, trans etc. etc.  (sorry to make someone an "etc." I am older and not as enlightened as I used to be
-People.  Any people capable of feeling thinking and laughing

The people who will not enjoy this book:

-my brothers (mostly the period chapter)
-Stephen Harper (actually he might enjoy it, he has time now that he is jobless)

Risks & Challenges

There is little risk in this endeavour.  It is a book.  It is written and in final editing stages and just need some marketing to kick start it.  The potential for this as a television show and further one woman shows is huge.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help, that is okay, maybe tell others?  Also look for the book when it comes out :)

Caveat:  I didn't know this was in American funds, so my Canadian contributors, which I imagine is most will have to see the currency rate.  So silly of me, see why I need a marketing person?? :)

story:
Mein Name ist Mara Kerber, Astrologische Psychologin aus Berlin und ich möchte Ihnen Pluto vorstellen.

Kennen Sie Pluto? Nein, nicht den großen Hund mit der Schlabberschnauze, ich meine die anderen drei Pluto: den Planeten, der jetzt keiner mehr ist..... den Gott der Unterwelt , Herr über Seelen und Schätze....... und vor allem den Planeten Pluto in der Astrologie, der schon so oft als Bösewicht herhalten mußte.

Warum      

ich das schreibe?  Es ist an der Zeit, Pluto in der Astrologie als den ganz persönlichen Aktivator der Entwicklung zu sehen.

Und dazu brauche ich Ihre Unterstützung.

In diesem Buch: „Ganz am Rande  PLUTO  Fakten und Ansichten“ sind astronomische Daten und die Entdeckungsgeschichte des Planeten Pluto ebenso zu lesen wie mythologische Hintergründe und Verweise und astrologische mundane Deutungen. Dazu kommen natürlich noch so einige Ergänzungen und Ansichten eigener Art, die ich für wichtig halte.

Also einmal Pluto rundum.

Das Buch wendet sich an Alle, die offen sind für neue Denkanstösse. Klassische Astrologen und astrologisch Interessierte finden eine erweiterte psychologische Deutungsmöglichkeit.  Für die Astrologische Psychologie bietet es den Ansatz, Pluto auch verstärkt unter dem persönlichen Gesichtspunkt zu sehen.

Für Alle, die sich noch nicht sicher sind, was sie von Astrologie halten sollen:

Astrologie funktioniert weitab von jeder dümmlichen Gleichmacherei, wie sie in den Zeitungen zu lesen ist und sie ist auch keine Wahrsagerei. Astrologie kann eine Hilfe sein, die Grundmuster eines Lebens zu erkennen. Astrologische Psychologie ist anwendbare lebendige Lebenshilfe. Die Stellung der Planeten wird in der Astrologie als Beschreibungshilfe für menschliche Umstände oder Zustände interpretiert, so wie ein Thermometer eine Beschreibungshilfe für einen Wetterzustand ist.

Der Planet Pluto ist dabei schon etwas Besonderes. Er wurde erst vor etwa 85 Jahren entdeckt und wird gegenwärtig von der NASA und ihrer Raumsonde „New Horizon“ näher untersucht. Zum Glück war diese gestartet, bevor Pluto zum Zwerg degradiert wurde und nun offiziell kein Planet unseres Sonnensystems mehr ist.

Astrologisch ist er auch schon immer ein wenig heikel, denn ihm wurden gerne alle bösen Mächte zugeschrieben und er sollte verantwortlich sein für alles mögliche Unglück. Nun macht aber ein Planet nichts weiter, als da draußen seine Bahn zu ziehen. Oder hilft es, aufs Thermometer zu schimpfen, wenn das Wetter kalt ist und Sie frieren. !?

Diese düsteren Zuordnungen hängen auch mit der Mythologie zusammen und dem Stellenwert, den das dem Verstand Verborgene im Laufe der Zeit erhielt. 

Die moderne astrologische Psychologie interpretiert Pluto als einen Vertreter der geistigen Planeten. Also als Symbol jener Instanzen, die über das begrenzte Ego hinausreichen und den Menschen und die Menschheit zu höherer Entwicklung antreiben.

Wenn Sie astronomisch interessiert sind, lesen Sie astronomische Bücher. Wenn Sie an Mythologie interessiert sind, greifen Sie zu Literatur über mythologische Überlieferungen. Wenn Sie astrologisch interessiert sind, müssen Sie nicht nur die astrologische Bildersprache lernen und die fachliche Deutung eines Horoskopes. Sie müssen auch die astronomischen und mythologischen Hintergründe eines jeden Planeten kennen und ihre psychologische Übersetzung, denn daraus speist sich seine Interpretation. 
Hier finden Sie eine Zusammenstellung aller dieser Fakten über Pluto, die als Hintergrundwissen für die Deutung erforderlich sind.

Der Buchtitel: „Ganz am Rande“ – meint: Pluto, ganz am Rande unseres Sonnensystems und Pluto, ganz am Rande unseres Verstandes –

Dahinter kommt ein Abgrund. Ignorieren wir ihn? Fallen wir hinein? Oder erforschen wir seine Tiefen, um die Welt und uns besser verstehen zu lernen?

Die Deutung von Pluto im eigenen Horoskop ist als Hinweis auf die treibende Kraft der eigenen Entwicklung zu verstehen.                                                                        Blicken wir in den Abgrund und erkennen wir die Wege der Wandlung.                   Dieses Buch könnte Anlass und Hilfe sein, den eigenen Weg zu finden.

Wozu Ihre Unterstützung ?

Damit das möglichst Viele nutzen können, bitte ich Sie um Ihre Unterstützung.

Das Geld wird für die Druckkosten inklusive der Zuarbeit für das Design benötigt, für die erforderliche ISBN und Werbung. Alles zusammen braucht es ca. 900 Euro. Je mehr zusammen kommt, desto eher kann ich das Buch drucken lassen und Sie können es lesen.

Falls mehr zusammen kommt als geplant, wird es einen zweiten Teil mit Interpretationsbeispielen zur persönlichen Deutung von Pluto nach der Methode der Astrologischen Psychologie geben.                                                                                   Wird das Ziel nicht erreicht, muß leider die am Projekt beteiligte Grafikerin noch etwas länger auf ihr Honorar warten. Das Buch wird gedruckt werden.

Was Sie bekommen

Als Dankeschön wird es geben:                                                                                          

  • das gute Gefühl, neuen Gedanken auf die Welt zu helfen                                  

  • meine Freude, ein wichtiges Buch veröffentlicht zu haben                               

  • das signierte Buch                                                                                                      

  • eine Zusammenstellung besonderer Begriffe der Astrologischen Psychologie
  • Ihr Horoskop mit kurzer Deutung der Pluto Positionen  (wie im Buch)    

Wenn Sie nichts von dem wollen, das Projekt aber gut finden, unterstützen Sie mich bitte, indem Sie Ihren Freunden privat oder auf facebook und co. hiervon erzählen. Indigogo hat die tools dafür.

Ich danke Ihnen für Ihr Interesse und Ihre Zeit

Mara Kerber



Hello,

I am Mara, Astrological Psychologist, Berlin, and I'd like to present you Pluto.

Do you know Pluto? No, not the adorable dog, I am referring to the other three Pluto… the planet, which isn't a planet anymore… the god of the underworld, who guards the souls and treasures… and the astrological Pluto, which so often has to play as the bad guy.

Why

I wrote this book ? It´s time, to see Pluto as activator for the own private evolution.

And for this I need your help.

In this book, “Marginal PLUTO Facts and Opinions” you'll find astronomical data as well as a history of the discovery of the planet Pluto, the mythological background and references, and astrological interpretations. There are of course some additions and opinions of my own, which I consider to be important. 

In short, Pluto all around.

This book is addressed to everyone who looks for new food for thought. Classical astrologer and interested persons will find advanced methods of interpretation. For astrological psychology it offers Pluto to see more individually.

You are not sure what astrology is good for?

Astrology is very distant from the silly levelling that is presented in the newspapers, and it is no fortune telling either. Astrology can help you understand the fundamental patterns of a persons life. Astrological psychology is applied (spirited) self-help. The constellation of planets is interpreted as a means to describe human situations and conditions, like a thermometer is a means to describe a weather condition.

Of the planets, Pluto really is a special case. It was discovered just about 85 years ago and is currently being explored by NASA and its spacecraft “New Horizon”. Luckily, the probe started before Pluto was degraded to a dwarf, and is now officially no longer a planet of our solar system.                                    Astrologically, Pluto has always been in an unfavourable situation, it was being associated with evil powers and held responsible for all imaginable misfortune. But a planet does nothing more than to follow its course out there.                                       Or does it help to blame the thermometer when the weather is cold and you are freezing!?                                                                                                                              

These dark attributions have their root in mythology and the increasing weight that was placed over time on things hidden from the mind. Modern astrological psychology interprets Pluto as a representative of the spiritual planets. That is, a symbol of those instances that reach beyond the limited ego and drive humans and humankind to higher achievements.

If you are interested in astronomy, you read books about astronomy. If you are interested in mythology, you look for literature about mythological lore. If you are interested in astrology, not only do you have to learn the metaphorical language and the qualified interpretation of a horoscope. You also have to know the astronomical facts and mythological background of every planet, because that is what enables their interpretation.

The book title “marginal” means: Pluto, at the edge of our solar system and Pluto, at the edge of our mind – beyond that is an abyss. Do we ignore it? Do we fall into it? Or do we explore its depth to better understand the world and us?

The interpretation of Pluto in your own horoscope is to see as an indication for the power of your own evolution.

Let's see in the abyss and identify the way of metamorphosis.

This book could be motive and help to find the own way.

In order to give this possibility to everyone,  I ask for your assistance to accomplish this goal. The money will be needed to cover the print cost, design, ISBN and promotion. The more people participate, the earlier the printed book will be ready and you can read it.    

In case of getting more money then planned, I will write a second part including examples of individual interpretation of Pluto in the method of astrological psychology.

In case of missing the goal, the designer will still have to wait longer for her fee. The book will come.

What you get

  • this good feeling to have put new thoughts into the world
  • my happiness to have published an important book
  • a set of terms used by astrological psychology                                          
  • your own horoscope as a triple (without interpretation)                                   
  • only in german language: your own horoscope with short description of the position of pluto (similar in the book)

If you are not interested in any of this, but you like this project, please support me by telling your friends or sharing this on facebook & co. Indiegogo has the tools to do this.

Thank you for your interest and time.

Mara Kerber

story:
Hello!

My name is Matt Wingett - a writer who lives in Portsmouth, UK. That's important to my story because the great Sir Arthur Conan Doyle is my neighbour... or he was, give or take a hundred and thirty years...

I have to admit it, in the last few years, I've become a bit obsessed with Sir Arthur. 

He was a puzzle. A brilliant writer; the man who created Sherlock Holmes - yet he also believed in ghosts. I asked myself: "How can that be?"

After all, Sir Arthur's great creation, Sherlock Holmes, once said:

"How often have I said to you that when you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth?"

So, how did Conan Doyle the man of science become Conan Doyle the believer in telepathy, ghosts, levitation, ectoplasm - and even fairies? To find out, I began sifting through the Arthur Conan Doyle Collection, a mass of archive material, letters, photos and books held in Portsmouth Library. 

One magazine in particular caught my attention. Light was a journal of the occult and paranormal that Conan Doyle wrote for throughout his Spiritualist career. It's the magazine in which he first announced himself a Spiritualist in 1887 when he was an obscure doctor working in Portsmouth - and the place in which he spectacularly went public again in 1916.

Reading through Light, I realised that in its pages, the whole story of his Spiritualism was told in his own words and those of his peers. And I also realised that most of those words had never been republished since Light first came out. 

           

I found Sir Arthur's story fascinating, and I believed with all my heart that other people would feel the same. That's why I decided to collect all of the letters and articles he wrote for the magazine, as well as all those about him by his contemporaries, into one volume. That way, I could piece together his extraordinary story and share it with others.

In Conan Doyle and the Mysterious World of Light that's exactly what I've done.

This book's publication will mark the centenary of the moment Sir Arthur Conan Doyle declared his Spiritualism to the world in 1916. 

It covers the early period of his growth as a Spiritualist from 1887, and then shows how his faith exploded on to the world's stage between 1916 and 1920. I write a commentary to explain the background of his letters, give short biographies of different personalities in the Spiritualist world and even discuss the nature of Spiritualist Science and how some of the greatest scientific minds of the age were convinced by Spiritualism.

Along the way, you meet scientists, journalists, writers and clergy who either agree with him or argue against him. You meet the believers who held views similar to Doyle's, and the mediums who drove the vast movement of Spiritualism that expanded during the Great War  and led to a 7,000-strong Spiritualist Memorial Service at the Albert Hall in 1919 where Conan Doyle gave a stirring speech to the assembled masses - reproduced here, in full. 

I believe anyone with an interest in Sherlock Holmes, in Conan Doyle or in ghosts will love the fresh light this book sheds on the great writer and his faith.

Surprises await!

Conan Doyle and the Mysterious World of Light also explodes some myths - like the popular idea that he became a Spiritualist after the death of his son, Kingsley, in the Great War. Or the idea (which I admit, I started off with) that Conan Doyle came to his beliefs in contradiction to his scientific beliefs. Not so. Mistaken or not, the two beliefs were a continuity of his world view. In writing this book, I grew to understand his faith and why so many were (and some still are) dedicated to it.

This is the first time Doyle's writings in Light have been collected in this way. Many of these articles and letters are republished here for the first time. Doyle's story is surprising. Over the course of four years from 1916, Doyle became the world leader of the Spiritualist movement. In 1920, he left the shores of the UK to go to Australia and New Zealand, dedicating the rest of his life to Spiritualist missionary work. At the same time, he continued writing his Holmes stories.

It's a an extraordinary tale. 

What I Need & What You Get

Well... here it is...

The main work has been done, and now it's just the formatting and tidying of the proof copy that I'm working on. With your help, I'll be able to print and distribute the book, publicise it and make it available to everyone. Printing a book and sending out advanced copies, seeking reviews and placing advertisements is not a cheap business. Thus far, I've funded the research out of my own pocket. It's been over a year of dedicated research, but now I need your help to take it further.

  • I've estimated I need £600 to print and send out Advance Reading Copies to the Press. 
  • I've also estimated I need £2400 to fund the printing and distribution of the first print run.
Especially for you:
  • What you'll get in return for your pledge is a copy of the book before any other members of the public get theirs. I will ensure that your copy goes out 2 weeks before launch, so you have yours way ahead of time. I will also sign your copy .
  • I'll include some juicy pdfs of Conan Doyle's Spiritualist works in return for your pledge - his books The New Revelation and The Vital Message. 
  • You'll also receive a pdf of the passionate debate Conan Doyle held with materialist Joseph McCabe at the Queen's Hall in London, in 1920 in which both tried to outwit the other with brilliant arguments.
  • What's more, you get your books at a discount, so not only do you receive your books before anyone else, but you also get them cheaper than anyone buying afterwards.
  • You can choose from the paperback for £10 (normally £12.99) plus shipping, or the hardback for £20 (normally £25) plus shipping.
  • You also have the chance to buy the signed, numbered, limited edition, of which only 50 will EVER be printed, for £45 (normally £50) plus shipping!
  • Then, something a little special: for £150 you get the hardback, plus I will deliver a talk to your society, school, club or group if you are within 60 miles of Portsmouth. (Beyond that, I will travel, but I'll need my travel expenses paid.)
  • For £200, I'll give the talk within 60 miles of Portsmouth, plus you get the signed, numbered limited edition (if we have any left!) or two signed hardbacks. Again, if you want the talk beyond that radius, I'll need you to cover the travel costs.
  • If I don't reach my goal, then the book will still go ahead, with a shorter print run, printing up only those you have ordered. This means that your copy will be a specialist item. But I'm hoping - and believe - that this book will be interesting to a wide audience.

The Impact Of Your Contribution

Part of my work has involved understanding the mindset of the people who were so dedicated to Spiritualism 100 years ago. It's been an intense time of studying, investigating and writing, and it has been deeply rewarding. 

Your pledge will show me my instinct was right - that there's a world out there that finds Conan Doyle and his life as fascinating as I do - and ghosts and the paranormal truly intriguing.

I come from a background of writing for a living. I used to write episodes of the ITV's The Bill and have written for national newspapers and magazines. I have written and published several books based in and around Portsmouth, including reprints of histories that have sold well in Portsmouth.

This book is a natural next step. Conan Doyle invented Sherlock Holmes while living in Portsmouth, and I believe the success I've had with my local books can be replicated on a wider scale.

I just need your help to do it. And I thank you now for taking the time and interest to order from me.

Risks & Challenges


Unlike Holmes fighting Moriarty, I'm pleased to report there aren't too many risks to me from deadly rivals. 

True, there have been some really excellent books written about Conan Doyle before (many of which have helped my own research), but as Leslie Price, the archivist at the College of Psychic Studies affirms in my book's preface, this is the first time Doyle's tale of Spiritualism has been tracked in his own words and in the words of his contemporaries. It does something different to all other biographical works and has a value of its own by setting him in the context of the Spiritualist movement of the time.

My real fear is that I won't achieve enough funding to publicise it further. However, there is unlikely to be a deadly plunge into a waterfall, so, as I say, the risks are really quite low. (Of course, Holmes, I agree one cannot entirely eliminate the possibility of a Reichenbach wrestle. But it is unlikely.).

If I do reach my goal or go beyond it, I intend to work on the next 10 years of Doyle's life, in which he argued with Harry Houdini, championed spirit photography, and even came to believe in fairies. This first book is dedicated to the seedtime for his ideas, when his amazing energy was turned to proving the whole question of survival after death.

I would love to know that you share my passion for this extraordinary man and his works, and hope you will join me on this journey of discovery.

Knowing you have bought this book will prove to me I have a strong base behind me - and that I was right to set this unique material before you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whatever you decide, do, please, tell others about this book. There is a whole world out there of people who would love to know more about Conan Doyle and the ghosts he believed he met - and even touched - at seances.

Give them the chance to find out about this extraordinary tale through facebook, twitter and all other social media.

However you show your support, I can assure you, I will be so grateful!

Thank you.

Matt Wingett, December 2015

story:
Short Summary

All WWII veterans have stories about their time in the service. These may focus on specific battles, camaraderie or daily life in their unit. Dr. Joyce Winfield shares 21 of these stories in the book: Forever Heroes: A Collection of World War Stories from Nebraska Veterans. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking money for the publication of this book. Specifically, funds raised will be used to not only produce and market the book, but to provide each of the veterans interviewed with his or her own personal copy, free of charge.

We have  created a series of rewards in exchange for your support of this project, which include both print copies and audio copies of the book.

The Impact

According to statistics released by the Veteran's Administration, our World War II veterans are dying at a rate of approximately 492 a day. Of the 16 million men and women who served our nation in World War II, about 855,070 are still alive. As one veteran told us, “I’m 91 years old, and in five or six years there won’t be any more of us.” That is precisely why their stories have to be told now.

Risks & Challenges

Because of the age of our veterans, time is of the essence. Our goal is to have this book available for veterans, their families, and their friends by Veterans' Day, 2016. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize not everyone can contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Stephanie and I am a single mother of three children. I started writing while in my teens and have had many poems and short stories published, however, nothing prepared me for this novel. This novel is dark and tormenting...a real struggle between darkness and light...and that is exactly why I NEEDED to write it. It was not a want, not nearly as fleeting as a simple desire, but an actual NEED. My life hasn't been the easiest, as I am sure that most of us can attest to, and after a 10-year long abusive relationship this book was something inside of me that I just had to get out. This book helped me heal - my words becoming more than just words while forming the intricate story that was in my heart.

This campaign is important to me because, even though this is a work of fiction (with many historical elements thrown in), it is a story that is engraved in my very soul. After a bad divorce, I was unable to continue the marketing from financial and time constraint perspectives. This will allow me to jump start my advertising in order to continue my dream of finishing this series...and hopefully bring closure to others that have struggled with their own personal torments.  

I am not able to express in words the significance this would have on my life - to have my story read, my voice listened to and perhaps, to touch someone else's heart.

A Gypsy curse binds two souls for all eternity...

Demyan is thrust into a concentration camp - his Gypsy heritage a sin to the Aryan race.  Suffering greatly in his imprisonment he is caught unaware when a mystical light sparks within his soul, irrevocably drawing him towards Alhena - a child of the Sinti.

But as the light intensifies, darkness seduces.

For 329 years, The Blood Countess has roamed the earth, searching for the one that will release her from a never-ending loneliness when she comes upon the camp of death.  Vowing that Demyan will be hers, she tempts him with pleasures of the body he's never known and he loses himself in her icy caress. 

His body belonging to The Blood Countess, his heart to Alhena. 

The Gypsy legends of his past soon come to haunt him, warning him of the mulo and he withdraws from her poisoned embrace, the light within beckoning him back to Alhena.  But when Alhena perishes in the gas chamber, he light in his soul is severed and The Blood Countess damns him to an eternity of darkness.

Until he feels the glowing thread winding it's way into his dead black heart from his mortal life...

The Blood of the Black Rose on Amazon

4.7 out of 5 star reviews

Fifty Shades of Grey Meets Interview with a Vampire! Love it! 

I couldn't put it down. The author uses impeccable writing to portray these characters so clearly it is as if you were right there with them living through this novel. I liked the fact that the author utilizes some guts to root the story in fact, such as the backdrop of the Holocaust (a controversial subject). It is the PERFECT blend of fact and fiction. The romance and sexual content is just enough without going overboard. Intertwine that with the old style vampire element (which is refreshing compared to the teen vampire genre btw); well...you have the best novel I've read in a LONG time. I would suggest this novel to any adult looking to step out of their everyday life and enjoy a bit of passion, excitement, darkness, romance, and a refreshing take on the legend of the vampire. VERY IMPRESSIVE!!!

Beautifully Dark and Romantic 

I chose this book  because I am a huge fan of The Vampire Diaries and True Blood. Each of those shows have a really haunting, romantic and dark backbone. They don't show vampires and glittery or beautiful creatures, they show them as dark creatures. When I heard of this book, I knew it would be one that I would love. It has so much more to offer than your typical vampire novels. It has romance, but not the kind that seems destined to work, it shows instead the longing and abandonment felt by love that doesn't come easy. As you read, it takes you through twists and turns that keep you guessing. And right when you think you know the characters, a twist comes that makes you question all you though you knew. I would recommend this to anyone and I will warn that once you pick up this book, you will not only want to keep reading, but you will find yourself wanting more...even once it's done. 

Extraordinary

This is not your typical vampire romance. This dark romance is heartbreaking, emotional, and has an ending that is unpredictable. The characters are so well developed. This story is for anyone looking for dark paranormal romance. 

HOT!!!

The Blood of the Black Rose had me turning pages nose to book. I could not put this incredible story down! The author definitely did her research before writing. I absolutely can't wait until the next in the series comes out! Definitely a must read!!

A Fresh New Take 

I found myself unable to wait for the next sentence as the vivid descriptions pulled me in! The author wipes clean the slate and resurrects the vampire of old. Paired with a rarely touched subject of the Holocaust, Gypsies and just enough romance to soften the darkness, the author brings a story that leaves you wanting more. Praise to the author for restoring my interest in the writings of the immortal soul and delivering a tale that keeps you from putting the book down in anticipation of what will come next! 

Awesome Writing

This author is able to take you deep into the story so that you're engaged with the characters and feel what they feel. Everything is very creatively described and forces you to go beyond your normal way of thinking and stretches your imagination into another world This is a great book and this author knows how to keep your attention and interest til the very end!!

This is Definitely One Book I Will Recommend

Once I picked it up, I could not put it down. Very well written and completely captivating. Dark v. Light is the ultimate struggle with us all and Ms. Collier embodies that in this book. 

Darkly Beautiful

A fantastic read. The level of historical accuracy for the characters, events, and lore are incredible. The author borders on sadistic with her ability to leave the reader on the edge of their seat and wanting more. The story and characters grabbed me by the nose and dragged me along for a thrilling and heart rending journey. 

What We Need & What You Get

I indie published The Blood of the Black Rose in February of 2014 and while it hit the #1 bestseller's list on Amazon for three weeks, it quickly began to decline after I was unable to promote while facing my own struggles. I know everyone has dreams of their own, dreams that the world needs to hear and see, mine is just a drop in that ocean, but something I feel I need to achieve if for nothing more than my story being able to touch someone. This will provide the necessary tools for my voice to be heard...the breakdown to where your contribution will be going is as follows: hotel stay, tickets for the event, table rental, banners, business cards, posters, bookmarks, costumes and the big expense...printing of the paperback novel itself (POD). 

The Impact

The effects this would have on my family and I would be surreal. It would allow me to live my dream while not putting my family in financial jeopardy and hopefully, be the catalyst of helping with some of that burden while working towards a continued career as an author. The Blood of the Black Rose has had it's small successes, but I would really love it if it could reach more people because it was written in what's known as a "dying" genre. The beauty and darkness of Gothic Romance is not as common as it once was and it is my hope that this novel may restore some of what was lost.

Risks & Challenges

With every dream there are challenges, there are risks...that is inescapable. There will be babysitting arrangements that will be hard to accommodate for considering I have so many kids (*laughs*), as well as the travel. The biggest hurdle of all is going to be the marketing itself! The articles weren't kidding when they stated that the writing and publishing of the book was the easy part! No matter what though, I will not give up and having the support system of friends and family makes almost anything attainable. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone has the funds to help...I know that it is a difficult thing to even ask for (or it is for me), and if you can't, that's alright and I really appreciate you taking the time to read this! Word of mouth goes a long long way and would be more than welcome as well! 

Thank you so much!

backdrop of the Holocaust (a controversial subject). It is the PERFECT blend of
fact and fiction. The romance and sexual content is just enough without going
overboard. Intertwine that with the old style vampire element (which is
refreshing compared to the teen vampire genre btw); well...you have the best
novel I've read in a LONG time. I would suggest this novel to any adult looking
to step out of their everyday life and enjoy a bit of passion, excitement,
darkness, romance, and a refreshing take on the legend of the vampire. VERY
IMPRESSIVE!!!

Beautifully
Dark and Romantic 
I chose this book
 because I am a huge fan of The Vampire Diaries and True Blood. Each of
those shows have a really haunting, romantic and dark backbone. They don't show
vampires and glittery or beautiful creatures, they show them as dark creatures.
When I heard of this book, I knew it would be one that I would love. It has so
much more to offer than your typical vampire novels. It has romance, but not
the kind that seems destined to work, it shows instead the longing and
abandonment felt by love that doesn't come easy. As you read, it takes you
through twists and turns that keep you guessing. And right when you think you
know the characters, a twist comes that makes you question all you though you
knew. I would recommend this to anyone and I will warn that once you pick up
this book, you will not only want to keep reading, but you will find yourself
wanting more...even once it's done. 

Extraordinary
This is not your typical
vampire romance. This dark romance is heartbreaking, emotional, and has an
ending that is unpredictable. The characters are so well developed. This story
is for anyone looking for dark paranormal romance. 

HOT!!!
The Blood
of the Black Rose had me turning pages nose to book. I could not put this
incredible story down! The author definitely did her research before writing. I
absolutely can't wait until the next in the series comes out! Definitely a must
read!!

A Fresh
New Take 

I found myself unable to
wait for the next sentence as the vivid descriptions pulled me in! The author
wipes clean the slate and resurrects the vampire of old. Paired with a rarely
touched subject of the Holocaust, Gypsies and just enough romance to soften the
darkness, the author brings a story that leaves you wanting more. Praise to the
author for restoring my interest in the writings of the immortal soul and
delivering a tale that keeps you from putting the book down in anticipation of
what will come next! 
Awesome
Writing
This author is able to
take you deep into the story so that you're engaged with the characters and
feel what they feel. Everything is very creatively described and forces you to
go beyond your normal way of thinking and stretches your imagination into
another world This is a great book and this author knows how to keep your
attention and interest til the very end!!

This is
Definitely One Book I Will Recommend
Once I picked it up, I
could not put it down. Very well written and completely captivating. Dark v.
Light is the ultimate struggle with us all and Ms. Collier embodies that in
this book. 

Darkly
Beautiful
A fantastic read. The
level of historical accuracy for the characters, events, and lore are
incredible. The author borders on sadistic with her ability to leave the reader
on the edge of their seat and wanting more. The story and characters grabbed me
by the nose and dragged me along for a thrilling and heart rending
journey. 

What We Need & What You Get I indie published The Blood of the Black Rose in February of 2014 and while it hit the #1 bestseller's list on Amazon for three weeks, it quickly began to decline after I was unable to promote while facing my own struggles. I know everyone has dreams of their own, dreams that the world needs to hear and see, mine is just a drop in that ocean, but something I feel I need to achieve if for nothing more than my story being able to touch someone. This will provide the necessary tools for my voice to be heard...the breakdown to where your contribution will be going is as follows: hotel stay, tickets for the event, table rental, banners, business cards, posters, bookmarks, costumes and the big expense...printing of the paperback novel itself (POD).    The Impact The effects this would have on my family and I would be surreal. It would allow me to live my dream while not putting my family in financial jeopardy and hopefully, be the catalyst of helping with some of that burden while working towards a continued career as an author. The Blood of the Black Rose has had it's small successes, but I would really love it if it could reach more people because it was written in what's known as a "dying" genre. The beauty and darkness of Gothic Romance is not as common as it once was and it is my hope that this novel may restore some of what was lost.   Risks & Challenges With every dream there are challenges, there are risks...that is inescapable. There will be babysitting arrangements that will be hard to accommodate for considering I have so many kids (*laughs*), as well as the travel. The biggest hurdle of all is going to be the marketing itself! The articles weren't kidding when they stated that the writing and publishing of the book was the easy part! No matter what though, I will not give up and having the support system of friends and family makes almost anything attainable. 
    Other Ways You Can Help I know not everyone has the funds to help...I know that it is a difficult thing to even ask for (or it is for me), and if you can't, that's alright and I really appreciate you taking the time to read this! Word of mouth goes a long long way and would be more than welcome as well! 
Thank you so much!

story:
Hey there! I'm Jodina Meehan, an artist in Southern Vermont who paints with sound waves, using a process known as "Cymatics" ...here's an image of the kind of art I make using salt, a violin bow and metal plates...

Over the past few years I have been commissioned to do cymatics projects for Cirque Du Soleil, for the show TOTEM, and also for National Geographic, for the episode "Patterns" on their show "Brain Games"...

Cymatics is fascinating because it shows something that is normally invisible - sound waves - in a visual way, such as in this video where I am playing a "violin" style plate-and-bow (the plate is brass, the powder on the surface is salt, and it is simply sound that is making the patterns)...

in november of 2014, the idea for a trilogy of fantasy books  with cymatics at the heart of it just "fell into my head" out of the blue one snowy day. I imagined this world would be called "CYMATICA" and that sound waves were the most powerful thing in this world, so powerful they were magic...and so powerful that sound has been outlawed...

I started writing down ideas and in about two weeks I had all three books laid out in a notebook, with characters, plot, and settings complete...I hadn't planned to write a fantasy trilogy but there it was, staring me in the face, asking to be brought to life...

 So I began getting up at 3 am every morning to write, and write, and write...until...today. :-) 

At this point, I am happy to announce that Book One in the series is finished! It's about 400 pages long, and the magical world of CYMATICA now includes character sketches, instruments from the world that I am working on building, and even a "secret alphabet" called the CODEX that is made up of cymatic symbols created with sound waves...

The heroine of Book One is "Cambiare" and as the story opens, sound has been outlawed in all of CYMATICA by the ruling class, because it is so powerful. Audible speech, singing and instruments are all illegal, and children wear boxes over their ears to show solidarity with The State. It will be Cambiare's task to defy the State and bring music - and magic - back to CYMATICA, along with the help of nine children from school who rally to her cause...

Here's what is needed now to bring CYMATICA to print so that you can read it and share in this magical adventure...

1. CYMATICA needs a professional edit. I have an amazing writing coach and agent who is working on the book with me to get it in shape for printing and publishing, Suzanne Kingsbury. I need about $5000 to get the manuscript ready to go to print. So that is what I am asking for in this initial launch. 

2. CYMATICA needs the artwork, maps, music, & the CODEX (cymatic alphabet) of its world to be completed so that they can be included in the book. I have a good start on all of these but it will take money to hire a videographer, recording studio, and to complete the art for the book. 

...So, as my STRETCH GOAL, once the original $5000 goal is hit, is $10,000. If we hit that, it will be used to create the music, art, and other elements above. This would be amazing to be able to do right away!!!

But the first milestone I need to hit is the $5000 to polish the manuscript. We have 30 days to do it...

Here's some of the REWARDS you can get when you pledge to this project and help me bring the world of CYMATICA to print: 

REWARD #1: Pledge $5 

I'll email you the first chapter from CYMATICA, from the original manuscript so you can read it now!

REWARD #2: Pledge $10

I'll email you ALL of the chapters of CYMATICA, from the original manuscript, once a week as installments! You will be able to read the whole book chapter by chapter, in it's pre-published version, right away.

REWARD #3: Pledge $25

I'll email you ALL of the chapters of CYMATICA, from the original manuscript, once a week as installments! You will be able to read the whole book chapter by chapter, in it's pre-published version, right away. PLUS I'll include printable copies of original art, sketches and pages from my journal for Book I, and early releases of the CODEX. This is the only level where you can get the limited early edition (with
art + CODEX letters) without waiting for it to be published later...

REWARD #4: Pledge $50

I'll send you a signed physical copy of the final version of CYMATICA Book One when it's published...in paperback...with the first card of the CODEX so you can start solving the secret messages! Plus you will also get one chapter a week of the original manuscript emailed to you as in the levels above.

REWARD #5: Pledge $100

I'll send you a signed physical copy of the final version of CYMATICA Book One when it's published...in hardcover...with the first card of the CODEX so you can start solving the secret messages! Plus you will also get one chapter a week of the original manuscript emailed to you as in the levels above.

REWARD #6: Pledge $500

You'll get 10 signed copies of CYMATICA Book One when it's published...so you can share with family and even more friends! Plus I'll put in CODEX cards with every copy so you call all work on solving the secret messages...and you will get one chapter a week emailed to you to read right away, as above.

REWARD #7: Pledge $1000

I will send you a one-of-a-kind, signed hardcover copy of CYMATICA Book One when it is published, with hand-drawn sketches in the margins, as well as...I will build you a Cymatic Plate-And-Bow like the one I am playing in the video! And I'll teach you to play it :-) Plus of course you will get one chapter a week in your inbox, to begin reading right now.

SUBMIT YOUR PLEDGE LEVEL BY HITTING THE  BUTTON AND CHOOSING YOUR REWARD LEVEL BEFORE YOU GO! 

Here are some of my websites so that you can check out my work (and the work of my teachers and students) in the hidden world of cymatics...

Journal Of Cymatics: http://cymatica.com/

School Of Cymatics: http://cymatics.ning.com/

My YouTube Page: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeH3S6hLpRLG0aM7SMDS4Og

AND here's my artist's CV so you can see what all I've done so far...

Profile : Jodina Meehan is a cymatic artist and educator working out of Brattleboro, Vermont USA. She has been working exclusively in the medium of cymatics, or sound waves made visible, for 10 years. 

Experience: Creation of cymatic instruments and art pieces— 2006-2016 . Built Chladni style bow and plate instrument based on plate used by Ernst Chladni in the 1700’s. Designed and built original “cymatic voicebox” for creation of visual patterns using the human voice, original “cymatic violin” handheld cymatic plate instrument, and a 4 person cymatic sounding chamber. Created large 5x5’ metal panels as well as 12x12 metal panels with fixed cymatic designs, as well as multiple videos and photos of cymatics. Built an electronic cymatics rig to use for filming footage for Cirque Du Soliel and National Geographic.

Founder and editor of the online Journal of Cymatics, publishing cymatics news and how-tos from around the world. Readership in over 300 countries, registered subscribers over 3000.

Founder of world’s first School of Cymatics, providing education, how-tos and networking for students of cymatics. Current registered membership 1000.

Cymatics commission for Cirque Du Soliel— 2010. Worked with Director of Visual Effects Pedro Pires to create cymatics film piece for Cirque Du Soleil, currently on tour for 10 years in Cirque Du Soleil show TOTEM. Film of salt cymatics on metal, projection size 20’x20’

Cymatics commission for National Geographic Brain Games— 2014. Worked with Executive Producer Jerry Kolber to film a cymatics segment for the National Geographic show Brain Games hosted by Jason Silva. Segment aired on the Brain Games episode “PATTERNS” August 18th, 2014 and included multiple views of cymatics on round steel plate with salt, filmed on location in NYC and at the artist's studio in Vermont.

Education: BA in fiction and painting, Marlboro College, Marlboro, Vermont, USA. Awarded MacArthur prize for excellence in painting on graduation.

Skills: Building cymatics instruments and art pieces, recording cymatics for professional use, cymatics technical advisor, throat singer (for use in creating cymatics designs), fiction writer, online publisher.

Awards: Awarded ISTA's Honor for Contribution To The Field Of Cymatics at the 10th Anniversary Cymatics Conference, 2015

Referrals :

“Thanks for your collaboration on this experiment! I'm very impressed! Your last clip looks great and promising for what we need...Keep on the good work!” - Pedro Pires, Director of Visual Effects The Red Violin, Image Content Designer TOTEM

“Just wanted to make sure you heard that the Brain Games episode PATTERNS with the Cymatics piece in it airs tomorrow Monday 8/18 at 9PM EST...And thank you for your time, it was wonderful to have you there.” - Jerry Kolber, Atomic Entertainment/Executive Producer, National Geographic's BRAIN GAMES

Risks and challenges

The only risk that I can foresee is that for some reason I may not be able to finish the book. HOWEVER. In order to write the 400 page first draft of the book this past year, I have overcome the following challenges:

1. I work at a job during all the daylight hours (I'm not paid to sit around on a tropical island and write. Yet.)

2. I have two children aged 3 and 9 whom I homeschool.

3. I have 4 black cats who need constant attention, food, and water...and...well, you get the idea.

How I've overcome these challenges in the past year is that I get up at 3:00 am every morning and WRITE. And WORK ON THE BOOK. No matter what. So...that's what I'll be doing this year, too :-)

So, I suppose that I could get run over by a steam train...or snatched up by a dragon and eaten...or an alien could come down and steal my brain out of my head to do experiments on...

BUT. Barring any of that, absolutely NOTHING is going to stop me from finishing Cymatica: Book One.

No matter what.

story:
Just in case you are the straight to the point type of person, here's the short brief:

I've written a really funny children's book about a pubescent girl who comes to terms with her bodily changes under unusual circumstances. All of the book illustrations are finished and paid for out of pocket. 

I need your help getting this project published, marketed and distributed plus IndieGoGo fees. The plan is to print exactly what you see below, a 5.5 x 8 dust jacket hardcover edition.

I believe more than ever, this book will give both girls and boys a new and profound perspective on the challenges of puberty. By supporting this project, you will help offer children a comforting and informative story about conquering pubescent fears and self-consciousness. 

... and for the, "I'm all ears” type of person, here's a longer brief:

I'm a wife and mother of two precious little girls, ages 7 and 13. They were the inspiration for this book and the book series to come. Their character names are June and Ally. The story is a narrative of Ally's diary entry about her experience of dealing with pubescent underarm hair. She goes through a number of actions trying to figure out what's happening to her body before consulting her mom. Finally, after somewhat of "a talk" with mom, Ally realizes she needs to find a way to get rid of the unsightly bush of pit hair, thrusting a whole new line of events into action.

This is one of the best stories I've ever read about puberty and I'm not saying that because I wrote it, *wink* . On another note, the real life "Ally" went through many different types of emotions during this stage in her life. Although, I was there to helped her through it, I went through many emotions about it as a child and again as a "parent" not knowing exactly how to help. Then, I had an epiphany.

What if there was a book out there about this stage of puberty? One that children weren't afraid or ashamed to read or even recommend to a friend? One with such a good story line, they'd almost forget they were learning the do’s and don'ts to pubescence underarm hair dilemmas. A book that would build confidence and support systems amongst children, even parents, who read it.

So, I decided to become the author of the book. I sat the girls down and told them of my plans. They said, it would be too embarrassing, but after the first few pages they were all in. I hired an amazing illustrator to help bring the story more to life and he did just that! Now, this story needs to be published and distributed to reach children near and afar. That's why I'm asking you to back Dear Diary—book 1.  I need your help to reach, teach, and inspire a new perspective on this subject.
















Learn more about all the characters at:   http://ajewelljohnson.wix.com/deardiary-com




Your generous contribution will help fund:


  • Manuscript Editing: Thorough review of basics grammar, spelling, punctuation, capitalization, and sentence structure for final drafting.
  • Interior Print Formatting: Development of content table, page layout, headers, and image insertion for a reader ready design.
  • Printing: 1350 DEAR DIARY copies! 
  • 20 soft cover limited editions and a few other perks!
  • Distribution: Shipping throughout the U.S. and U.K.

  • Website: Personalized domain name and registration, SEO, Google Analytics, Dear Diary personalized interactive activities, and a custom favicon!
  • Online Marketing: Google Ads, Youtube, email marketing, social media marketing, limited pay-per-click, and designs.
  • Advertisements:  Radio Stations local in Georgia. Florida, New York, United States Virgin Islands along with Grade School Speaking Engagements plus Print Advertisements 

  • Book Shipping Boxes
  • Shipping Labels
  • Small Business Shipping Account             


                                                    

               

                   

                               

                                                 

      

                    

                                        

  



Some people just can't contribute the funds and we understand, but that doesn't mean we don't need your help. So here's what you can contribute:

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about DEAR DIARY.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! It makes it easier.

And that's all folks for now.

through it, I went through many emotions about it as a child and again as a
"parent" not knowing exactly how to help. Then, I had an epiphany.
What if there was a book
out there about this stage of puberty? One that children weren't afraid or
ashamed to read or even recommend to a friend? One with such a good story
line, they'd almost forget they were learning the do’s and don'ts to
pubescence underarm hair dilemmas. A book that would build confidence and
support systems amongst children, even parents, who read it.
So, I decided to become the author of the
book. I sat the girls down and told them of my plans. They said, it would be
too embarrassing, but after the first few pages they were all in. I hired
an amazing illustrator to help bring the story more to life and he did just
that! Now, this story needs to be published and distributed to reach children
near and afar. That's why I'm asking you to back Dear Diary—book 1.  I
need your help to reach, teach, and inspire a new perspective on this subject.

story:
We hope you'll support our superhero anthology, Behind the Mask, which will be published in May 2017. Story submissions are open through 9/15/16, and we'll be finalizing the list of selections in October and November 2016. We've already signed one of our favorite authors Seanan McGuire for an original story, and based on the hundreds of submissions we've already received, we're going to have a hard (but fun) time narrowing the field down to 80 to 100K for the final book. Your support will help with production costs, increase our author payments, add illustrations, and increase the size of our initial print run.

The Editors

This book is being co-edited by Tricia Reeks & Kyle Richardson, editor and assistant editor of Love Hurts: A Speculative Fiction Anthology. Praise for Love Hurts anthology:

"'I’ve always had a taste for dark,' says Reeks in her introduction, and she goes on to prove it with a top-shelf selection of tales, 20 of which are original to this book. . . A well-organized, wide-ranging collection of consistently strong genre stories." -- Kirkus Reviews

"For fans of weird and beautifully written genre fiction, LOVE HURTS is a work that delivers 26 distinct emotional roller coaster rides, each as different from one another as they are from any other story you’ve probably ever read. As full of creativity as it is of heartbreak, it’s a book that truly is full of surprises." -- IndieReader (4.5 Stars) 

 The Publisher

The official spiel: Meerkat Press is an Atlanta-based independent press committed to publishing irresistible, unforgettable prose and poetry. Our books range from literary to genre fiction with quality the common denominator.

The unofficial: We're a small group of book nerds who love finding cool stories and sharing them with the masses. 

What We Need

Your support will allow us to:

- increase author payments

- offset production costs (book cover, book design/typesetting, editing, proofing, initial print run)

- commission illustrations for the book

- increase our initial print run

Funding Goal - $10,000 

[Allocation: $500 Indiegogo, $500 Transaction Fees, $1000 Perks, $4000 production costs, $4000 author payments]

In addition to offsetting production costs (including our initial print run), this will allow us to increase the author payments by .02 per word making the new minimum .04 per word.

Stretch Goal #1 - $13,000

[Allocation: $150 Indiegogo, $150 Transaction Fees, $300 Perks, $2400 author payments and illustrations]

If we hit our 1st stretch goal of $13,000, we'll increase the author payments by .02 per word making the new minimum .06 per word. We'll also commission some cool illustrations.

Stretch Goal #2 - $16,000

[Allocation: $150 Indiegogo, $150 Transaction Fees, $300 Perks, $2400 author payments and print run]

If we hit our 2nd stretch goal of $16,000, we'll increase the author payments by .02 per word making the new minimum .08 per word. We'll also increase the size of our first print run.

If we go over our stretch goals, we'll use the money to offset marketing expenses and increase the size of our print run!

Perks

Here are just a few of the cool perks we'll be giving away!

- digital versions of the book (ePub, .mobi, or PDF)

- print versions of the book (trade paperback)

- merchandise with the awesome cover design by Keith Rosson (t-shirts, mugs, etc.)

- digital anthology pack (Behind the Mask, Love Hurts, & My Cruel Invention)

The Impact

This campaign will help ensure we can continue our commitment to short fiction! Short stories ROCK!

Risks & Challenges

This book will be published in May 2017. Risk is low as we'll pay authors at the lower rate and will not have illustrations. We'll also start with a smaller print run.

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that some folks who want to help, just don't have the extra funds. That's cool! You can still help by helping us get the word out and making some noise about the campaign! So please share this on social media and via email to your friends, family, and all the superheros and sidekicks you know!

Thanks so much and we can't wait to get this book out to the masses!

story:
“...my humanity is co-substantively bestowed upon the other and me. Humanity is a quality we owe to each other. And if we belong to each other, we participate in our creations: we are because you are, and since you are, definitely I am. The ‘I am’ is not a rigid subject, but a dynamic self-constitution...”—Khafre Kujichagulia Abif

Publishing suffers from a major diversity problem. Statistics show that the vast majority of books published are by white authors and about white characters. Part of the problem is that the majority of the staff behind the scenes, including publishers’ employees and reviewers, is also white. When almost all of the gatekeepers and decision-makers are white, it is no wonder that on average only 10% of children’s books published each year are by or about people of color.

For decades there has been overwhelming agreement in the industry that there should be more diversity at all levels in the book world, but the problem never seems to go away. Where do we even start?

If we are serious about trying to address the lack of diversity in the publishing world, creating Ubuntu Press is but one first step we need to take. Sharing our numbers as an industry will not only clue us in to important patterns that we may be missing, it will also show that we are committed to change.

In the past, publishers have usually put the responsibility on readers for the lack of diverse representation in books. The extremely dated adage that “diverse books do not sell” has become a belief that has reached mythical proportions. While it’s important for readers to support diverse books with their dollars and voices, it’s equally important for publishers to self-reflect on how they can do better on their end. We must acknowledge that one factor contributing to the lack of diverse books is the lack of diversity among the people who edit, market, review, and sell the books.

The goal of Ubuntu Press is to serve as editor, marketer, reviewer, and seller of books from often marginalized communities which is inclusive of genre, gender, race/ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability. To facilitate writer, poets, and artist who would like to pursue publishing their work. Ultimately, Ubuntu Press aims to increase diverse books in the children’s and adult book world.

Through your support and participation in this campaign we can work together to put in place sustainable programs that will increase diversity among publishing staffs in the long-term. Together, we can create a more inclusive book publishing industry.

“Ubuntu [...] speaks of the very essence of being human. [We] say [...] "Hey, so-and-so has ubuntu." Then you are generous, you are hospitable, you are friendly and caring and compassionate. You share what you have. It is to say, "My humanity is caught up, is inextricably bound up, in yours." We belong in a bundle of life. We say, "A person is a person through other persons."

[...] A person with ubuntu is open and available to others, affirming of others, does not feel threatened that others are able and good, for he or she has a proper self-assurance that comes from knowing that he or she belongs in a greater whole and is diminished when others are humiliated or diminished, when others are tortured or oppressed, or treated as if they were less than who they are.”

Ubuntu Press will work in the spirit of Ubuntu seeking, supporting and sharing the stories and works of the collective community voice in an effort to build a greater human experience.

What We Need & What You Get

Resources to self- publish the first two complete manuscripts the Ubuntu Press forthcoming titles.

Forthcoming manuscripts from Ubuntu Press

Raising Kazembe: A Memoir This collection of journal letter written by an HIV positive father to his son. It chronicles the lesson of life and education, the mental and emotional health of a father who deals with isolation, stigma, mental health issues as well as how the traumas of his childhood plays out in his parenting and desire to heal.

Sistah’s Speak (voices of HIV positive women) is the working title for a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art from women living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for women to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of women people living with HIV/AIDS.

He Ain’t Heavy (voices of HIV positive heterosexual men) is the working title for a collection short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art of heterosexual men living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks to create a space for heterosexual men to share their stories in their own voice sharing with an opens heart as a vehicle for chronicling your lives. The goal of this project is to empower, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of all men people living with HIV/AIDS.

It Is Our Turn to Speak (voices of youth ages 13-29), anthology is a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art that features the voices and stories by youth responding to HIV/AIDS and the world in which our youth have to navigate as well as how HIV/AIDS effects their communities and relationships youth live in.

A Pastor’s Prayer for People Living with HIV/AIDS a collection of intercessory morning and evening prayers, for the people living with HIV/AIDS. This project seeks inspirational prayers that opens the heart, supports the soul and uplifts the spirit of people living with HIV/AIDS.

TransVoice: Shout Out Loud a collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays, visual art, and personal stories of from the voices of transgendered people sharing their struggle, triumphs and victories. The purpose of this collection of voices is to document for perpetuity the lives of transgender person’s uniqueness and conviction to push through societal ignorance, stigma, shame and most importantly to live and shout out loud.

FACE US: Not Our Status But Our Story This coffee table portrait book of the faces of HIV in the southern United States. Each face represents a story of love, healing, and survival `in the deep south where the rates of HIV continue to rise and The South has not faced the epidemic.

Our Lives Matter an anthology collection of short fiction, poetry, creative nonfiction, personal narratives, critical essays and visual art that features the voices and stories of Black American’s responding to the institutional systems which continue to perpetuate violence and the dismissal of the humanity of Black American’s through racism, sexism, homophobia, trans phobia, bisexual erasure, police violence and the disappearance of Black men through mass incarceration, HIV criminalization and more.

All-in Branding Package, Custom Logo Design Package, a color palette, typography palette, a Stationery Design Package, a Landing Page Design Package, Blog Design Package, and a Brand Moodboard.

Custom Logo Design Package

Final logo files for both web and print: Scaleable, vector files: You will receive an .ai (Adobe Illustrator) and .eps file for your finalized logo concept

Vector PDF file: excellent for printing; can be opened in Illustrator

One high resolution .JPG logo file with a white background. You will receive this file in CMYK (for printing purposes) and RGB (for internet use).

One high resolution .PNG logo file with no background.

Final logo files in three different versions: ◦Full-color logo (main version)

Grayscale logo

Logo to use with a color background

Small version of your logo to use as a favicon or icon

COLOR PALETTE

This palette includes three primary, three secondary and two tertiary colors.

STATIONERY

LANDING PAGE DESIGN

2 rounds of revisions

Google Analytics integration

Mailchimp or other mailing list form integration for signups

Responsive (optimized for mobile devices)

Two rounds of design revisions

Installation and setup

BRAND BLOG DESIGN

A custom Tumblr blog template with branded design elements

Custom Header with background image

Custom Sidebar Titles

Custom Navigation Bar

Complementary blogging planner (in PDF format)

BRAND MOODBOARD

A handy PDF Brand Moodboard which includes the following: color palette, logo design, images that represent the identity of the brand, strategic notes describing the concept, textures and other design elements that will guide your brand’s communications.

Software upgrade to Microsoft 10

HP Office Jet Pro 8630 printer

The Impact

I have asked myself this question. “How can I use my position, knowledge of publishing, writing, editing, and sharing stories to help create a literary world that is diverse, equitable, and doesn’t just represent the same segment of society it always has since its inception? What concrete actions can I take to make actual change and move beyond the tired conversation we’ve been having for decades about the lack of diversity in publishing?”

Creating a small business which is Ubuntu Press was the answer. Yours support will allow Ubuntu Press to seek the voices and stories of those under- represented in publishing. Together will be allow the stories and history of our collective community to be told.

The impact of Ubuntu Press will be creating and building community through publishing where, “A person is a person through other people' strikes an affirmation of one’s humanity through recognition of an ‘other’ in his or her uniqueness and difference. It is a demand for a creative inter-subjective formation in which the ‘other’ becomes a mirror (but only a mirror) for my subjectivity. This idealism suggests to us that humanity is not embedded in my person solely as an individual; my humanity is co-substantively bestowed upon the other and me. Humanity is a quality we owe to each other. We create each other and need to sustain this otherness creation. And if we belong to each other, we participate in our creations: we are because you are, and since you are, definitely I am. The ‘I am’ is not a rigid subject, but a dynamic self-constitution dependent on this otherness creation of relation and distance”.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share and get the word out there, the more you can get the word out there to everyone, the quicker we can meet our goal.  Tweet, Facebook, Email.
