self-constitution dependent on this otherness creation of relation and
distance”.
Other
Ways You Can Help
Share, share, share and get the word out there,
the more you can get the word out there to everyone, the quicker we can meet
our goal.  Tweet, Facebook, Email.

story:
Join us on our quest to help the world live with love for 21 days! To help others truly fulfill their purpose, step into their passion and create the life they dream from a place of love. Together we can create a movement…that begins in our hearts! Send in your stories of living with love, contribute to our campaign and help us fund and shape the book that will change thousands of lives and more!


Our Story

SoulEvents was founded by Lee-Ann Frances Bates in 2015 to uplift humanity and create a movement towards greater peace and abundance for all. During the creation of premier event, SoulTalks it became clear to her that her work over the years around living a love based life was influencing the conversations leading to the event, shaping the people lives involved in the event and allowing people to create radical and empowering change in their lives.


During the event, each inspiring talk (a conscious conversation), wrapped back to the same simple foundational concepts Lee-Ann had been teaching and mentoring. As the day built in energy in was becoming clear that the 21 Days of Love Challenge that had been created on air only weeks prior and was to be issued at the event was more than just a simple challenge. It was life changing experience that allowed people to develop radical self awareness, empowerment, peace and freedom in their lives.

As the time to issue the challenge grew near, one member of the team Cody Wicks, was so inspired by one the talks that he asked to step forward and issue the challenge himself. He shared his journey of making only love based decisions, starting in his work and spreading throughout his life for 21 days in the summer. As it would happen, within 24 hours of writing a paper on that experience, the idea of the challenge came up again in a radio interview, where Lee-Ann organically announced a 21 day challenge to listeners! After his story was shared people at the event and the challenge was issued, people began taking the challenge, creating their own events online for it (and we encourage you to do the same), sharing their stories and creating new life experiences filled with greater love and joy!

In the most wondrous way two concepts Lee-Ann felt deeply about began to merge. The message: Living according to our Soul Led purpose meant living and creating from our Hearts. The Heart being the gateway to our Soul...that place of our loving and authentic, purposeful and complete selves. When we dare to take a leap and live without listening to fear...when we dare to live and love as our most authentic selves...honouring ourselves and the world through loving action and thought...following our passion and bliss and allowing the heart to led our minds...we find miracles and positive shifts happening in our lives with greater ease...we find ourselves more supported, peaceful, happy, content, abundant and fulfilled. We become free to live the life we desire and able to create it with more ease and harmony. Then the magic really happens because for each person that lives in peaceful abundance another person is so inspired and set free to also create this new kind of life. Our peaceful abundance grows into peaceful abundant relationships and those relationships into neighbourhoods and neighbourhoods into a peaceful abundance country and countries into a peaceful abundance world.

We feel the path to peace on this planet means helping others live a peaceful, passionate, empowered life of love and abundance so we want to take this world wide through a book and help as many people as possible live the life they dream of. We choose to live according to our hearts and follow our soul led purpose so that we can create a better world for all and through the campaign and the creation of this book, we'd like to share that journey with you. We want every person on this planet to live the life they dream...to feel connected...to know their power....to experience the freedom and peace of mind that comes with living a life of love.

Join us today, as we create together, a love based movement to shift humanity and inspire the world. Work with us to empower the world. starting with yourselves, one conscious conversation at a time, one person at a time and one love based decision at a time!  21 Days of Love has already begun to change lives and now it can change yours too. Join us as we inspire people to live the life they desire, help us shape the book with your stories as you take the challenge and lets change the world today!



Our Commitment to You

If you join us and raise 0-$11,000 we will:

- Create the momentum for this book plus SoulTalks 2016 and other SoulEvents.

- Gift you with special ticket pricing for those that join us!

- Offer unique workshops, events, products, and services to support and expand SoulEvents in Vancouver and around the world.

- Post videos and write ups on living with love so you can be supported in taking the challenge.

- Gather additional content for and start writing the book...additional funding will be needed to to complete and publish it so lets keep the momentum going! So much gratitude!

If you join us to raise $11,001 to $22,000 we will:

- Complete the SoulTalks 2015 video Playlist‎ of all speakers from this year's event and offer for free online as we build our new SoulTalks website!

- Create a 21 Days of Love specific Facebook page for sharing and creating a more love filled world!

- Expand our SoulTalks website which inspired this book and give you a voice in how and what we create!

- Expand our event offerings! All contributors will get an additional rewards!

If you join us to raise $22,001  to $31,999, we will:

- Develop and launch a 21 Days of Love specific website with excerpts and previews from the book, places to share your stories and read those of others, create a Soul Movement of living with love!

- Create a custom live online world wide love meditation to shift the planets energy!

- Create a 21 Days of Love community for our contributors on Facebook for sharing and creating a more love filled world!

If you join us to raise $33,000  to $44,000, we will:

- We made it! We will publish our book: The full 21-day love challenge, with the process for creating the most joyful and loving life and stories about living with love from our community of contributors. We may ask to share yours!

- We will offer the book and ebook to our contributors at one time pricing and may even give you a sneak peek not seen anywhere else prior to publishing :)

If you join us to raise $44,000 plus, we will:

- We will release more stretch goals to take the book on tour, get you signed copies of the book and offer you more perks so we can share the love with you in even more incredible ways!

If you join us to raise $55,000 plus, we will:

- We will release another level of stretch goals for an exclusive Mastermind Group for all contributors and fans plus so much more!

Make sure to check the perks section for a full list including updates and availability. Please also note that the products received may vary from the pictures.

Soul Love & Membership - $5

The gift that keeps on giving. Your name will be added to our LOVE List and we will have a group of energy practitioners send you loving and abundant energy during the campaign and upon closing. As a member of our community you will also get access to our newsletter with special offers and information for upcoming events. PLUS you will get to watch the campaign and receive updates as we go!


Soul Letter - $10

*Receive previous perks* Plus a personal thank you note signed and from us!


Crystal Gratitude - $15

*Receive previous perks* Plus 3 small energetically charged crystals for ideal for things like energy work on the body, meditation and enjoyment.


Soul Art - $25

*Receive previous perks* Plus receive a digital copy of the Merka-Bah LilyPads by MetaStazi that can be used as a background on your computer. This piece (shown below) is a mandalic, kaleidoscopic, and sacred geometric manipulation of photographs of nature. The geometric forms and merkaba in the centre of the piece are marvellous to the eyes and energeticlly heart opening.


Abundance Manifesting - $50

*Receive Soul Love & Membership Perk* Plus a specially recorded meditation for this campaign by Lee-Ann to release blocks to abundance by Lee-Ann.


Relationship Manifesting - $50

*Receive Soul Love & Membership Perk* Plus a specially recorded meditation for this campaign by Lee-Ann to release blocks around relationships, attract more ideal relationships and bring greater harmony to your life.


Empowerment Manifesting - $50

*Receive Soul Love & Membership Perk* Plus a specially recorded meditation for this campaign by Lee-Ann to release blocks around self value and increase your confidence.


Abundance Magnet - $85

*Receive Soul Love & Membership Perk* Plus a specially recorded meditation for this campaign by Lee-Ann to release blocks around self value and increase your confidence plus you will get a empowering crystal pendant that will bring more of this energy into your life.


We are updating this list...please see the perks section for a more complete offering.

Other Ways You Can Help

- Share this campaign using the share tools or on your social media! Talk about it, share it, live it, love it! This campaign is all about you, make it yours! Share your journey, share your passion...send us pictures, videos and more on our social media sites. Find our page on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/soultalksglobal

- Join the challenge on Facebook and invite your friends to our Facebook event:
https://www.facebook.com/events/1718849451669904/

- You don't need to wait for the book to try this now! Create your own Facebook event for your very own 21 Days of Love Challenge, and learn with us! Let us know and we will link to and support your own events.

- Message us and tell us how we could help you get involved! We are open to all suggestions and believe in collaboration!

- Message us to apply to be a Team Member and get a unique URL to share with friends and family! If we get enough people involved we will create a community page for just the team members!

- Consider joining with the minimum of $5 and follow the updates as we post on our 21 Days of Love Challenge!

story:
Short Summary

Hello and hola. I’m Julio Urdaneta and I’m the Editor and Publisher of Arenga\Digital, a Spanish-language news and opinion website. 

Arenga\Digital’s mission is simple: Give a voice to journalists in Latin America and Spain, showcasing long form and editorials on issues that are often ignored by the American press. 

The influence of Latin America is increasing daily in terms of economics, politics and culture. But it doesn’t stop there: From the prices at grocery stores to the democratic process, nearly everything – including the words we use, the music we hear, the movies we watch and the clothes we wear – is influenced by the realities south of the border.

What happens in Mexico City, San Jose, Bogota, Buenos Aires and Rio de Janeiro impact Latino life as anything that happens in New York or Los Angeles.  

Arenga\Digital brings these stories to the forefront, shining a spotlight so readers find the news that matters to them now... or the news that will impact them in the coming days. 

But our mission doesn't end here. 

Arenga\Digital wants to become a place where journalists can also improve their reporting and storytelling skills. Having been hired as a consultant to teach journalism in Latin America, I have learned that professional development for journalists is often an afterthought: The priority is to continuously break news – often without the type of proper reporting and fact checking that should be held as a standard. Too many outlets today rely on the element of surprise, the shock factor, and sensationalism over depth and context. 

Arenga\Digital will change that. 

Journalists from Latin America will be able to pitch their stories to a team of highly respected journalists and experts all over the world who will critique and edit their work.

The end product will be journalism of the highest caliber, such as:

Venezuela: Las verdades tras la política

De Trainspotting a Breaking Bad: cambia la droga, no el gobierno

India: Un latinoamericano describe los rituales, la comida y los bailes en un boda sij

Deslave de El Cambray 2: Otro octubre negro en Guatemala

In order to pursue our goals to inform and teach, we need your support. 

Thank you very much for your support. Please share this campaign with your friends!  And follow us on Twitter and become our friend on Facebook. 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise US$5000 to: 

- Pay for operating costs (server, domain, hosting, etc.)

- Pay our writers and contributors a small stipend for their work. Each will get US$ 25 per published story. 

- Register Arenga\Digital as a proper business and/or NGO (we want to be able to solicit grants and tax-exempt donations in the future).

Risks and challenges

We have a running website featuring an array of stories.

We're extremely proud of the work that has been done, but so far all of it has been pro bono.

If we are going to demand the best from our reporters and editorialists, they must be compensated. If we are going to demand stories be carefully researched, fact checked, and live up to the highest journalistic standards... the time and training required for that needs to be rewarded.

If I am to demand the best, my reporters demand to be treated like the best. 
If I get the funding, I will be able to expedite the growth of the site, and more importantly... it's mission.

There are stories out there you need to know about. They may be stories of your family in San Salvador or about your business partners in Buenos Aires. They may be stories about the environment, the drug war, or archaeological discoveries involving the Maya and Inca.

The world is open, but our eyes will never be opened to it unless we turn our attention to the stories that would otherwise remain unseen.

Arenga/Digital is already hard at work.

It needs your help to continue.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Michelle Reed, and I am the author of the Atman City trilogy, a young adult fantasy series that follows a newly departed teen's remarkable journey through the afterlife.

 

 

Life is easy. Death is hard. Dez is about to learn the difference.

Bleeding to death on the side of a rural highway turns out to be the easiest part of Dez Donnelly’s unexpected Saturday. Swept away to Atman Station, the crossroads of the afterlife, Dez discovers her unprepared soul is trapped between worlds in a limbo existence where she’s given two choices: join the program or face the consequences.

Limbo is no picnic. Her new reality is conduct manuals, propaganda, and unrelenting staff orchestrating a complex program designed to help transitional souls accept death and move on. Resistance is met with swift consequences, not the least of which is an invasive procedure that links Dez’s mind to that of a senior staff member. To make matters worse, the beautiful and enticing Atman City—a stunning but dangerous metropolis that borders the outer boundaries of the station—is strictly off-limits to underage souls.

Dez has to choose: go along to get along, or fight for the future she believed in. In an afterlife on hold, the only thing harder than getting out is getting through.

It is time to get ready to launch the trilogy, which has been a labor of love that I can't wait to share with the world! Your contributions will help make this series a reality.

Here is where the money will go

A great story needs great support in order to succeed, and the cost breakdown is as follows:

  • Covers: Never judge a book by its cover? Please. We all know it's a major factor in our decision to read or not to read. A quality eBook and paperback combo with barcode costs $400.00 and up. Total for three covers: $1,200.
  • ISBNs: What's that, you ask? ISBN is the International Standard Book Number, which is a unique commercial book identifier. Have a book nearby? Flip it over. See that ten or thirteen digit number near the barcode? Each version (eBook, paperback, hardcover) of a single title needs its own ISBN in order to be sold in any retail format (Amazon, etc.). ISBN ten-pack: $295.00.
  • Formatting: Each title needs to be formatted from a Word document to eBook and paperback. Total cost for three titles: $300.00.
  • Marketing and advertising, promotional materials, and Indiegogo fees: A book needs marketing and advertising to get noticed. An example of some of the advertising costs, per title: PW (Publishers Weekly) Select: $149.00. Kirkus review: $425.00. Kindle: $100.00 minimum campaign budget. Total: $1,200.00.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every contribution—no matter how big or small—is a huge help, and greatly appreciated. This is a grassroots effort, so even if you can't support the campaign financially, you can help in other ways.

  • Help spread the word and share the campaign via social media, talk to friends and tell your co-workers. Do you have a blog? Every share helps!
  • Click on the share links above. It only takes seconds, but makes a big difference!

An example of some of the advertising costs, per title: PW (Publishers Weekly) Select: $149.00. Kirkus review: $425.00. Kindle: $100.00 minimum campaign budget. Total: $1,200.00.


Other Ways You Can Help
Every contribution—no matter how big or small—is a huge help, and greatly appreciated. This is a grassroots effort, so even if you can't support the campaign financially, you can help in other ways.

Help spread the word and share the campaign via social media, talk to friends and tell your co-workers. Do you have a blog? Every share helps!
Click on the share links above. It only takes seconds, but makes a big difference!

story:
Guys, absolutely don't feel pressured to do this, but if you wanna help me become an author who makes a living off their work, this would be a huge help to me.

PERKS (aka what you get for donating):

I was first an editor before I became a writer, did you know? I fell in love with it, and know I'm going to college for writing, editing, graphic design, and art - everything you might need in the publishing business except for maybe marketing. I wanted to one day make my YouTube channel an outlet for my fans to ask me about writing and editing, and possible buy my editing services, too. It was one of my long time goals when I started my channel. Even now, I'm getting job offerings at my college and elsewhere to edit essays and novels, but I want to give back to you guys first, because you are the ones who got me here. Please, allow me to give back. I want my publishing project to be a group effort. I will of course have you guys help me pick cover art, titles, synopsis and so on when that time comes, but right now I'm in the writing/editing stages, and I want you to be a part of it!

Each perk will include all the other perks cheaper than it except for the full novel edit. For example: If you buy one of the signed book perks, you will get a signed copy of the book of your choice (make sure to choose the right one in the perks category) plus I'll compile all of the lower perks on top of that (12000 - 15000 total words edited + a shoutout on any social media). The reason some of the perks are limited is either because of time limitations or a limit in stock. Also, I ranged the amount of words for the edits because chapters don't usually fall into a perfect word count. I want to be able to edit your full chapters and not have to stop in the middle of one. The more you spend, the more words you get for your money!

Also, all of this is optional. I'll send out an email listing what you are accessible to, according to the reward you purchased, and you can decline whatever you want from there (you don't have to get the social media shout out for instance, if you don't have one or want privacy).


If you want to pay for any of these rewards once, then you're at the right place. You can donate as many times as you want here before the campaign is over. However, if you want to donate on a long term basis, head over to my Patreon (https://www.patreon.com/EditingNextNovel) where you can get the same exact perks every month!

I'm working on two books at the moment, focusing mostly on my Crime/Thriller/Mystery novel now while also uploading advice videos covering writing, editing, and publishing, going to college for writing, and posting blogs about all of the above. I'm trying my absolute hardest to achieve my dreams. Literally any amount could go a long way. I'll be going to college every fall, spring, and summer semester from here until spring of 2019, if you're wondering. I am also planning on taking the job offering in the Writing Center at Bluffton next fall where I will be grading essays in and out.

There's always other ways you can support me, as well, like following me on social medias or buying my books! I'll link all of those sites below. THANKS FOR THE CONSIDERATION! 


Where you can find my books: http://www.amazon.com/Brista-Drake/e/B00YZGC792/re...

Twitter: https://twitter.com/WritingMime
Tumblr: http://writingmime.tumblr.com/
Writing Blogs: http://writingmime.blogspot.com/
http://writingmime.wordpress.com/

story:
Short Summary

I'm Melanie Linn Gutowski, a local author and historian. In 2013, I published a book called Pittsburgh's Mansions, which you may have seen in local bookstores and gift shops. You  may also have seen my writing in the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Pittsburgh Quarterly or at NEXTpittsburgh.com. I'm now writing a new book, a history of Kaufmann's Department Store, to be published in the fall of 2017.

This campaign will help offset the cost of image rights needed to be able to bring you the high-quality images you're used to seeing in Arcadia Publishing's Images of America Series. You know the books: sepia-toned covers with lots of black-and-white photos inside. Those photos aren't cheap; though they're owned by  non-profit organizations like libraries and historical societies, there is a cost to secure the rights to put the image into a book. Arcadia Publishing doesn't provide an advance or any other financial support to authors in securing those rights, so that's where you come in!

You've probably spent many years of your life shopping at Kaufmann's and were sad to see it go. By contributing to this campaign, you will be part of the next chapter of the store's legacy.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm trying to raise at least $4,000 to offset the cost of image rights fees. These are fees charged by the institutions (libraries, historical societies, newspapers, etc.) that own the photographs I'd like to publish in my book. 

Image rights run anywhere from $10-$90 per image for this type of project, and by contract I'm required to have at least 180 images in the book. As you can imagine, that adds up fast! Some images, like those published before 1923, can be published for free, but as we all know, Kaufmann's was around for a long time after that, and of course we'd like to see photos that were once in newspapers and magazines.

What do supporters get?

There are some great perks, including having your name printed in the book's acknowledgements or receiving a signed copy before it's available in stores! 

What if I don't reach my goal?

If I don't reach my goal, any money raised will still go toward the book and everyone will receive the promised perks. Not reaching my goal will just make it a little difficult for me to come up with the funds to complete it. Writing is how I make a living; it's not just a hobby, so I do rely on the money I make writing and selling books to help support my family.

The Impact

There's never been a pictorial history of Kaufmann's before, until now! You'll get to see how the store looked when your mother, grandmother and maybe even great-grandmother shopped there. You'll see downtown Pittsburgh change from dirt roads to cobblestones to streetcars and pavement. You'll relive your memories of browsing Christmas windows every winter and teenage afternoons spent cruising the Kaufmann's at your local mall.

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks to backing this project. I'm under contract to write the book and deliver the manuscript early next year no matter what! Either way, you'll be able to buy the book in local stores in the fall of 2017.

I've already written one book for the same publisher, so I am used to completing book projects in a timely manner.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help! 

  • Tell friends, coworkers, and anyone interested in Pittsburgh's history!
  • Use Indiegogo's tools to share this campaign on your social media accounts.
  • If you have a photo or something else to share regarding this project, email kaufmannsbook@gmail.com.

story:
What is The Reprobate?

Too impatient to read all this? Click below to check out the 88-page issue 0 now.

READ ISSUE 0 FOR FREE NOW

The Reprobate is a grown-up (though not necessarily mature) reading alternative for the reader who has put aside childish things but who retains the elements of the rascal, the miscreant, the cad, the bounder, the quaintrelle, the loafer… the reprobate. The person who may have developed finer (or possible lower) tastes in all things, yet who has not yet submitted to tedious conformity. The malcontent who knows that the good life always needs a decidedly bad side.

The Reprobate is the magazine for ladies and gentlemen of leisure... the decadent elite who are so far ahead of modern trends that they have gone full circle and are now bringing up the rear. It’s for those who believe in minimum effort for maximum reward, who feel an Englishman’s home is his castle (or his castle, his home) and that a life devoid of risk is a life devoid of pleasure... and that pleasure is the only thing in life that really matters.

So we are aiming our magazine at the modern contrarian. The lady or gentlemen who knows that style and fashion are very distinct things, with only the former being important. The lover of the esoteric and the arcane. The nostalgist who is not blindly tethered to the past. The admirer of beauty and grotesquery. The sort of person who simply can’t resist tweaking the nose of convention and who cares not one jot for perceived wisdom. The person who believes that physical activity is to be avoided whenever possible, and who believes that too much is never enough. The person who sees government drinking guidelines as a bare minimum and health warnings as a recommendation. The person who likes to take up a contrary opinion just for the hell of it. The sort of person who comes with a trigger warning. The decadent, the freethinker, the rebel, the nuisance and the iconoclast for whom a ‘safe space’ is anathema.

The Reprobate is designed to provoke thought and discussion amongst those content with neither the status quo nor Status Quo. We appreciate art, style, manners, insight and outbursts - we, like yourselves, recognise a tattered paperback as an illuminated grimoire; an unsold 1950’s seven inch single as the melodic hymn from the unloved dead; a conversation beginning with, “I probably shouldn’t tell you this”, as pure-spun gold.

Who We Are and What We Plan

Each edition of The Reprobate will be at least 88 pages (if we have more ads, we print more pages), printed on high quality matte stock in full colour. We plan to publish quarterly, with supplements and offshoots along the way. The print magazine is backed by the website, which features extensive and exclusive reviews, news and galleries, and our social media pages on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram, where we will share updates, opinion and inspiration.

And we have big ambitions – as well as the magazine, we will be launching a podcast ands online radio show, live video broadcasts and Reprobate events over the next 12 months.

The Reprobate is edited by David Flint, formerly editor / publisher of Divinity, Sheer Filth and Headpress magazines, and an experienced journalist and cultural historian, who has contributed to magazines Penthouse, Loaded, Bizarre, Skin Two, Rapid Eye, Flesh and Blood, Knave, Sky Magazine and many more.


One issue of The Reprobate will cost £6.00 plus shipping, while a subscription will be £24.00 plus shipping for four issues. Subscriber copies also include an exclusive free gift with each issue – anything from an exclusive CD to fridge magnets. Subscribers will also get first pick of limited editions. And of course, a subscription inoculates you from any cover price increases during the length of the subscription.

Issue one is planned for release in September 2016, and is already in production. You can look forward to the fashion tips of Human Centipede director Tom Six, articles on Tiny Tim, Whitehouse, Russ Meyer, Luxor Press and fetish clubbing, interviews, reviews, photo shots and more. Read our free, full-length digital only issue 0 here.

Our contributors (current and future):

Jason Atomic, Bruce Barnard, Daniel Black, Gipsie Castiglione, Darius Drewe, Daz Lawrence, Ade Furniss, Leslie Hopewell-Ash, John Martin, James McBean, Gavin Morrow, Lucy Morrow, Charlie Oughton, Naila Scargill, Steven Sheil,  Arthur St John Bullivant, Mark Stevens,  Nigel Wingrove… with more to come.

What We Need

As a new launch, The Reprobate has little money and lots of ambition.  We have the ways and means to publish the magazine one way or another – so any backers can rest assured that they will get what they have paid for – but we would like to do this properly. We want to raise enough money initially to ensure that we can do a decent print run of the magazine, enabling us to distribute to shops and suppliers across the UK and the world.

We also want to place the magazine on a sound financial footing, ensuring that we can continue and expand with future issues.

Beyond that, if the campaign is successful enough, we badly need to upgrade our equipment – issue 0 has been produced on a Mac that has seen better days.

And last, but not least, we want to pay our contributors. Too many magazines – online and offline – treat struggling writers, artists and photographers with contempt by not paying them. We want everyone involved in the production of The Reprobate to at least be paid something, and for that something to increase as the magazine takes off.

Our Perks

We like to think of this as pre-ordering, rather than asking for something for nothing. But we have a variety of offers available, including advertising space and merchandise. We'll be adding more perks as we go along - and we will have Reprobate goodies available on the website soon.

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to raise enough support for The Reprobate to be able to reach as wide an audience as possible, for us to pay our contributors and for the magazine to have a sound footing on which to develop.  By building a strong subscriber case, we can ensure that the magazine is able to develop  and expand, hitting shops and creating more awareness.  

If things don't quite work out that way, then rest assured that there will be a magazine, somehow or other. We promise to keep you in touch with developments and changes, and we won't be spending any of your money without consulting you if things change significantly from the current plan.

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, times are hard. We know that. But if you can't help us out with pre-orders, you can still show your support for this project by plugging the hell out of us on social media, websites or while annoying people down the pub. The more publicity we can get, the better our chances.

And feel free to plug the website and point people towards issue 0. Thank you and goodnight.

story:
¿Estás preparado para hacer parte de esta revolución de sabores?

Maittaa es una iniciativa que quiere darte momentos para cruzar sonrisas con tus amigos, vibrar con la buena música y refrescarte por medio de combinaciones de sabores que sólo tú puedes crear.


¿Cómo lo hacemos?

En Maittaa empezamos haciendo la selección de las mejores frutas que vienen directamente de los campos fértiles de nuestro hermoso país Colombia…

Estas frutas las ponemos a tu disposición para que a tu gusto escojas cuales desearías tener congeladas en tu paleta. Una vez nos lo haces saber, nosotros las cogemos y las picamos en trocitos de sabor.

Y combinadas con esa pulpa que te hace agua la boca, las vertimos en los moldes, los cuales los metemos en un recipiente mágico y en menos de 3 minutos estará lista tu paleta.

Y ya...  soló queda bailar al caer del sol con los sabores que se derriten en tu boca.

Para crear todo esto necesitamos que nos des una manito, con tu apoyo lograremos llegar a millones de personas con felicidad en forma de paleta en nuestro punto móvil. Apúrate!! Hace calor y no queremos que tu paleta se derrita!!

Nuestros sabores...

Para conocer todos nuestros sabores visita la página http://maittaa.com/


¿Qué necesitamos?

Para hacer este sueño realidad sólo nos hacen falta dos cosas claves para el desarrollo del proceso:

  • El recipiente para la congelación, que es donde la paleta pasa de su fase líquida a sólida. Este cuesta alrededor de 2.500 USD.
  • El motocarro en el cual saldremos a repartir sabor por toda nuestra ciudad. Este nos cuesta 10.000 USD (incluida su adecuación).
  • Los otros 2.500 USD los utilizaremos para herramientas y permisos para la puesta en marcha del proyecto.
Independiente si nos puedes aportar o no, apóyanos a correr la voz y hacer que muchas personas más se enamoren de Maitta al igual que nosotros.

NUESTRO EQUIPO

Michael López -el de los números-

Negociador internacional por convicción. Emprendedor, diseñador y bohemio de corazón. Cree que la magia de vivir está en conocer nuevos lugares y nuevas personas que llenen la vida de experiencias.

Cristian Castaño -el creativo-

Publicista de profesión, emprendedor por naturaleza.  En cada grupo de amigos tiene un apodo diferente. Cree en la magia, las buenas energías y en el poder de una sonrisa.

¡2 amigos con la idea de repartir sabores y sonrisas por todo el mundo!

Are you ready to be part of this revolution of flavors?

Maittaa is an initiative that wants to give you an experience to cross smiles with friends, vibrate with good music and cool through combinations of flavors that only you can create.

How do we do it?

In Maittaa we start making the selection of the best fruits that come directly from the fertile fields of our beautiful country Colombia ...

We put these fruits at your disposal for your taste, then you choose which you wish to have frozen on your popsicle. Once you let us know, we chop them into pieces of flavor.

And then combined with your favorite pulp, we poured them into molds, which we put in a magical vessel and in less than 3 minutes you will have your popsicle.

story:
After a year of dreaming and five months (and continuing!) of putting a dream into action, I (Thu Nguyen) am super excited to share with you my biggest passion project yet. As a proud Houstonian and advocate for Asian American identity, I am pursuing to create a magazine that will showcase both. Rice Paper is currently a Houston based magazine focused on the local AAPI community. Everything in this magazine will have been produced by or be about an AAPI. It is a platform for AAPIs to showcase their work - be it writing, photography, art, design, etc - or to tell their story - experiences related to race and ethnicity, their start up business, or their struggle with mental health.

The name Rice Paper was given by a dear friend who taught me the importance of unity within the Asian communities. Rice is a food that is central to all of the Asian cultures, so just as rice is a uniting food for Asians, I hope Rice Paper can unite all of the AAPI communities by learning each others' stories and supporting each others' endeavors.

I strongly feel that Rice Paper should be a physical magazine because it will be a tangible form of the AAPI identity that can be passed around, studied, and discussed about. I am looking to raise $3,000 to pay for the printing and distribution of this first issue, and whatever is left will be used for the next issue. The official launch of our first issue is January 28th, 2017!

 

You can always help by following the Instagram @ricepaperhou or liking our Facebook page!

My inbox/social media is always, always open for questions, comments, story pitches or inquiries! thudawin@gmail.com or @thudawin on IG/FB

 

Thank you to OCA-Greater Houston and Debbie Chen for giving me the final push and a small donation to pay for some of the printing, thank you to Bo for naming the magazine and constantly inspiring and supporting me, thank you to Andy for saying yes every single time I ask you to photograph or video something, thank you to Cindy for being patient and always listening to my crazy ideas and almost always going along with them, thank you to MaiTHao for being the most bomb graphic designer ever and basically becoming my partner in this production, thank you all to Sophia and Kim of Montrose Shop, Trang, Sydney and the crew at Myth&Symbol, Vico and Kevin at TOMO, and Christina of Sunchild for being warm, generous and inspiring people - gosh, I feel so cool to be able to thank you all like this. Thank you to Linh and Laura, my mentors from VSA, for encouraging me and giving me strength to do what I am doing now. And, last but not least, thank you to Vicki Ho and Kathleen Tso, for starting Banana Magazine and inspiring me to bring the idea (with a twist) to Houston!!

 

With much love,

Thu Nguyen
Founder

story:
Why A Book?

Historic moments like these require more than a passing Internet mention.  They need to be remembered in hard-copy.  To that end, we will produce a beautiful collector’s edition of the best flip-off pics made in front of Trump Tower that have ever been produced.  It's amazing, it really is.  And I mean that.

 

Who Are We?

Who we are isn't important.  What is important is that America make great flip-off books like this again.  We've been sending these jobs to the Chinese and the Mexicans...That has to stop.  That has to stop.  And it stops right now.  It really does.  We need to make middle-finger books right here, in America.  That's right.  Like we used to.  That's what we need to do.  Right now.  We're going to do it.  Just like that.  It's done.

 

Our Inspiration

Just use the google.  It's incredible, just look at this:

"Flipping Off Trump Tower For Instagram Now Trending In Chicago..."

"A simple search of Trump's namesake tower at 401 N. Wabash Ave. reveals at least a handful of middle finger portraits every day, a social..."

"The Newest Selfie Hot Spot: Giving the Finger to Trump Tower | WIRED"

"Two, actually: the Trump Tower skyscrapers in Chicago and New York. ... gleefully flip off the Donald's monuments to himself and post the pics ..."

"Girl flipping off trump tower - Album on Imgur"

"Album tagged with ios; ... Girl flipping off trump tower."

"Girl flipping off Trump Tower. THAT'LL SHOW HIM! - Reddit"

"I work across the street from Trump Tower. Tourists flipping off the building has been a constant sight for the last 6 months..."

"Middle fingers are flying around Trump Tower - redeyechicago.com"

"Chicagoans have never warmed up to the gigantic Trump Tower, and now they're ... Friends that flip off Trump together, stay together, right?"

"CNN Just Accidentally Aired Girl Flipping Off Trump Tower ... for all of us in one united voice as she give Trump Tower the middle finger. Thus ..."

"Flipping Off Trump HQ Is The Selfie Trend Making America Great Again"

"People Are Posting Pictures Of Themselves Giving Trump Tower The Middle Finger On Social Media"

 

This thing is yuuuge!  It's really yuuuuge!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We just need to cover the costs of assembling the photos and printing the book.  That's it.  It's that simple really.  It's really simple.  It really is.  You add to the campaign, you get a book.  Just like that.  Real easy.  It couldn't be any easier.  It's true.  Trust me, it's true.

 

The Impact

Having one of these books to show to your friends will change the world.  It really will.  Believe me it will.   We're going to change the world together.  It's true.  Believe me.

 

Risks & Challenges

If we run into debt problems it's okay.  No really, its' okay.  We'll just renegotiate the terms.  Really it's okay.  I've done it before.  I'm a successful business man, its okay.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You want to help us get pictures, that's great.  Help us get pictures.  That'll be a real help.  We'll love that.  We love you.  You are our kind of people.  I really mean that.

story:
For those of you who know tgl books, you know that I have been translating books on baguazhang and xingyi since before 2000. This is the first book that I have written extensively on my own, not simply translated. I want to get it right.

The crowd funding is to pay for plane to and from China and hotel costs in Shanghai and Beijing. I stay in pretty cheap hotels, but not in a bunk bed in a hostel (at the moment I am in a $35 room without a window).  If I don't get the complete goal in funds, every little bit helps, I'm already in Shanghai. In the old days I used to stay with my teachers and friends for training, but things have changed, so I need more cash when I go for extended visits. This time I will be there for five weeks, and the hotel cost alone is $1560.

The perk is a PDF of the complete translation of the 36 verses, pre-publication. I have set it up for teaching purposes with one verse per page in huge text, with Chinese, pinyin, and English. Once the book is published, this version will not be available any more. Another 'perk' is a pre-order of the final book, which I well mail once it is published. This perk included a hefty donation. If you want to get either of these without donating, you can order them from my website, no problem.

story:
Thanks for finding my page on IndieGoGo.  I believe that children are most attracted to books that make them laugh and my goal is to enter this market.  Although it is much easier to get published with the advent of ebooks, it is amazing how difficult it is for a new author to get a book into print.  That is why I am asking for your help.  If you have young children or know young children who you think would enjoy this book, as well as the other books in this series,  then please support this campaign.  You can help make reading so much fun for early and young readers as well as help launch a new author.  

I have spent years creating these books, finding the right illustrator and working hard to craft stories that will enthuse young children and encourage them to read.  Please be part of this journey and support this campaign.

We have some wonderful prizes, from a first edition copy of the book, signed by the author, to the original artwork, signed by the illustrator.   In the world of electronics, creativity and encouraging kids to read books is all the more important, and this campaign is about helping spread great stories to growing minds: with your support we can bring smiles and laughter to children.

 

What We Need & What You Get

It costs about $4,000 to get this campaign fully funded - enough for us to get this book published with a few dollars for marketing.  Also key to a children’s book are first class illustrations, and Oleg has done an amazing job.  That is why one of the key offerings are his original drawings.

All funds raised here will be spent on publishing this book, and if we raise enough, we will be able to publish more books in the series.  If we raise less than the target, then we will still publish, albeit based on a smaller run.  Every dollar helps, and every share on Facebook or recommendation to a friend helps.  Please be generous with your time to make this happen.

Anything you can do to help will be greatly appreciated.

story:
We are self-funding both books!

Broken Together Book

We want to thank you for checking out our campaign. If you want to donate without any of the perks we have lined up, that is perfectly fine too. Either way, we appreciate you and anything you can do to help this book become a reality. We are self-publishing the book!

We are writing 2 marriage books right now and both have different aspects. Here is how Broken Together came about:

When you start connecting the dots, you realize how powerful God really is! You say WOW this all makes since.

For example, a while back Pastor M. Anthony Bailey which I have been friends with for years and who is one of my mentors led me to a guy named Jeff. Jeff and I have become friends and when we first talked, he led me to a song called "Broken Together" by Casting Crowns". I wept the first time i heard that song and still do every time. It is a powerful marriage song.

Fast forward, we are writing a book called "Inspired Marriage" and one of the chapters was gonna be called "Understanding The Past" but the more I thought about it, I felt in my heart "Broken Together" was a better title for that chapter.

Then at our church recently, The song "Broken Together" was played I think for the first time if i am not mistaken. Again, I wept especially with the story that they played with it and as we watched the story and heard the sermon, I felt God nudging me saying that "Broken Together" should not be a chapter in the book but in it's own book.

As I sat down with Sandy, we discussed that and the pieces of the puzzle started coming into fruition. She agreed with me that this needed to be a book in itself.

The more we talked the more we realized this is what God wanted us to do. As we created the outline and chapters, i started to wept all through it again and knew we had to create this book.

I also felt like God didn't want is to abandon the book "Inspired Marriage" either so we are writing both at the same time which is really crazy but its been amazing.

The more Sandy and I discuss what needs to be in "Broken Together", we realize WOW this is HEAVY for us. We can't take this book lightly because this is gonna break so many chains!

The book is called "Broken Together" Subtitle: Understanding How the Past Affects Your Marriage.

As we look back, we are in awe at this connection and if you take any part of this story away, you would see that we may have missed what God wanted us to write! Just in awe at this. I am freaking out here because as I write this, i have chills!

Both books will be fully written this year! WOW, it all works together for the good!

 

Inspired Marriage Book

We are writing two books, one is "Inspired Marriage" & "Broken Together" to  help marriages grow. I went through 19 years of addictions until God healed me over 9 years ago and that resulted in saving our marriage. "Broken Together" will be powerful as it looks at how the past affects your marriage. We believe both books will change marriages in different ways. God not only healed my heart but he healed our marriage too.

We are also launching a marriage ministry to help other couples live an inspired marriage. The whole concept of Inspired Marriage will be our platform to tell our story at churches and organizations that allow us to come in.

Sandy and I felt the call to the marriage ministry back in 2010 or 2011 timeframe. We never really moved forward out of fear. We knew we had a story to tell and we are finally stepping out on faith because this is what we have been called to do.

The first 3 chapters of "Inspired Marriage" will be our story:

  • Chapter 1 - Where it all Began
  • Chapter 2 - From Fairytale to Nightmare
  • Chapter 3 - A New Beginning

That is the first 3 chapters. The rest of the book will be about application. We felt like we needed to lay the foundation with our story in the first 3 chapters so that you can see that we have been where you are and understand that we fully understand.

We will talk about what it takes to create an inspired marriage. So many couples are married but in reality they only share a bedroom and that is it. We want to help you go from a bad marriage to a good marriage. We also want to help you go from a good marriage to a great one and from a great one to an inspired marriage!

All this can be accomplished no matter where your marriage is at as long both husband and wife want better. This book is not about how to get your spouse to love you again even though you will learn some things that may help you there. This book is about two people that don't want the marriage to end and wants to find a better way. Or couples that are doing pretty good but want even better because no matter where you are at within your marriage, it is always a work in progress.

We will talk about some of the things that we have done through the years to create the closeness and the connection that we have today. You will see as you read our story that all the odds were against us because of my addictions. You will see that if we can turn our marriage around, there is still hope for your marriage!

We are writing the book as we speak and we feel led to have the book done by August 1st so that we can have it printed by Oct 5th which is our 15th year wedding anniversary. This plan is attentive right now but the book will be published because we feel our story needs to be told. Too many people that know us have confirmed that as God has been directing us through this whole process.

The money here will help us get the book edited, created and even printed. Any funds that are left will help us grow our marriage ministry so even if you already got a copy of the book, you can just donate to this page too in whatever amount you want to.

Some of the projects in our future?

  • Inspired Marriage Book
  • Inspired Marriage Ministry
  • Inspired Marriage Retreats
  • Inspired Marriage Conferences
  • Inspired Marriage Magazine
  • Inspired Marriage Online Membership
  • Plus More!

As you see the future looks bright for everything we are building around the platform of Inspired Marriage. We just need your help to get this off the ground so that we can go to the world and tell our God-Inspired Marriage story because without him, we would not be here today! When God healed me over 9 years ago, that was a new beginning for us and we have grown so much since. That day changed EVERYTHING and we want to help you change everything too!

Again, I wept especially with the story that they played with it and as we watched the story and heard the sermon, I felt God nudging me saying that "Broken Together" should not be a chapter in the book but in it's own book.As I sat down with Sandy, we discussed that and the pieces of the puzzle started coming into fruition. She agreed with me that this needed to be a book in itself.The more we talked the more we realized this is what God wanted us to do. As we created the outline and chapters, i started to wept all through it again and knew we had to create this book.I also felt like God didn't want is to abandon the book "Inspired Marriage" either so we are writing both at the same time which is really crazy but its been amazing.The more Sandy and I discuss what needs to be in "Broken Together", we realize WOW this is HEAVY for us. We can't take this book lightly because this is gonna break so many chains!The book is called "Broken Together" Subtitle: Understanding How the Past Affects Your Marriage.As we look back, we are in awe at this connection and if you take any part of this story away, you would see that we may have missed what God wanted us to write! Just in awe at this. I am freaking out here because as I write this, i have chills!Both books will be fully written this year! WOW, it all works together for the good! Inspired Marriage BookWe are writing two books, one is "Inspired Marriage" & "Broken Together" to  help marriages grow. I went through 19 years of addictions until God healed me over 9 years ago and that resulted in saving our marriage. "Broken Together" will be powerful as it looks at how the past affects your marriage. We believe both books will change marriages in different ways. God not only healed my heart but he healed our marriage too.We are also launching a marriage ministry to help other couples live an inspired marriage. The whole concept of Inspired Marriage will be our platform to tell our story at churches and organizations that allow us to come in.Sandy and I felt the call to the marriage ministry back in 2010 or 2011 timeframe. We never really moved forward out of fear. We knew we had a story to tell and we are finally stepping out on faith because this is what we have been called to do.The first 3 chapters of "Inspired Marriage" will be our story:
Chapter 1 - Where it all Began
Chapter 2 - From Fairytale to Nightmare
Chapter 3 - A New Beginning
That is the first 3 chapters. The rest of the book will be about application. We felt like we needed to lay the foundation with our story in the first 3 chapters so that you can see that we have been where you are and understand that we fully understand.We will talk about what it takes to create an inspired marriage. So many couples are married but in reality they only share a bedroom and that is it. We want to help you go from a bad marriage to a good marriage. We also want to help you go from a good marriage to a great one and from a great one to an inspired marriage!All this can be accomplished no matter where your marriage is at as long both husband and wife want better. This book is not about how to get your spouse to love you again even though you will learn some things that may help you there. This book is about two people that don't want the marriage to end and wants to find a better way. Or couples that are doing pretty good but want even better because no matter where you are at within your marriage, it is always a work in progress.We will talk about some of the things that we have done through the years to create the closeness and the connection that we have today. You will see as you read our story that all the odds were against us because of my addictions. You will see that if we can turn our marriage around, there is still hope for your marriage!We are writing the book as we speak and we feel led to have the book done by August 1st so that we can have it printed by Oct 5th which is our 15th year wedding anniversary. This plan is attentive right now but the book will be published because we feel our story needs to be told. Too many people that know us have confirmed that as God has been directing us through this whole process.The money here will help us get the book edited, created and even printed. Any funds that are left will help us grow our marriage ministry so even if you already got a copy of the book, you can just donate to this page too in whatever amount you want to.Some of the projects in our future?
Inspired Marriage Book
Inspired Marriage Ministry
Inspired Marriage Retreats
Inspired Marriage Conferences
Inspired Marriage Magazine
Inspired Marriage Online Membership
Plus More!
As you see the future looks bright for everything we are building around the platform of Inspired Marriage. We just need your help to get this off the ground so that we can go to the world and tell our God-Inspired Marriage story because without him, we would not be here today! When God healed me over 9 years ago, that was a new beginning for us and we have grown so much since. That day changed EVERYTHING and we want to help you change everything too!

story:
Hello! My Name is S. A. Koyen and I am a writer of Young Adult fiction.

My campaign is all about getting a beautiful piece of art out there, and I need your help! This book is so important. Depression is a serious illness, and as a professional therapist I felt there wasn't enough written for youth to depict, or be relatable to the actual feelings of depression. For everyone who knows me this book speaks to my passion for kids. Have you known someone with depression and had a hard time understanding what they were going through? Have you been depressed yourself and couldn't explain to anyone how you felt? Without Wings recognizes how difficult it is for those who don't understand what depression is like, and it captures a true sensory depiction of it, bound together with the delicateness of young love in a story that will touch your heart. Without Wings shows how to foster resiliency, how to rise and overcome, and and how to triumph over this debilitating illness. Who better to tell the story than depression himself!

If you know someone, or are someone with depression this book is for you! If you have children, this book is for you! If you connect with the 80's and all of its unique history; the music, the fashion, the culture, the cars...this book is for you! If you are a lover of poetry, drama and beautiful prose this book is for you! There is something for everyone in this story and this campaign is aimed at raising money to finite the best that it can be.Not only will you get to see my dream come true, but you will also get to be a huge part of the process and I will owe its success to you!

Right now, I am working with a New York editor, who is helping me polish the manuscript to perfection. This is really going to elevate what I already find to be a good book, to a great book, and I am so excited about this collaboration! The cost of this 3-4 month process is 1400$. When the manuscript is finished, publishing costs are approximately 1000$. The last 400$ will be used for promotional costs, and pay for any unforeseen publishing revenues.

I have some exciting perks in store for you as a contributor! Don't think of this as swag, but as thank you's for helping me promote my book!

  • Gift certificates for coffee or to bookstores
  • Coffee Mugs
  • Signed Hard and soft cover books
  • Book Bags
  • A chance to be come a character in the book!
  • Acknowledgement in the book
  • Social media shout out
  • Invite to book launch party
  • Meet and Greet
  • And more...

If I don’t reach my entire goal, the money made will go directly towards editing and publishing at a lower cost margin.  I want to put the best product out there and that requires time and patience, but the deadline to have the project completed is November. As the date approaches, everyone will receive an invite to the party,  and if you can't make it, your product will be shipped directly to you! There is no risk involved as the manuscript is completed, and I have researched the publishing process thoroughly. 

If you are not able to contribute financially, there are other ways to help.

  • SPREAD THE LOVE and get the word out! Share with as many people as you can, your efforts will not go unnoticed! Watch the opening book trailer to get an idea of the story, and share share share!

 

Thanks!

S. A. Koyen

http://www.shellykoyen.wordpress.com

S.A. Koyen @withoutwings on Facebook

S.A Koyen@contessdelapoem on Twitter

story:
FIRST EVER BOOK FOR EMPLOYEES!

 HR and ADA Facilitator Providing Practical Guidance to Employees Managing Health Conditions in the Workplace

As a certified HR and ADA Coordinator, I facilitate and mediate ADA compliance issues between the employee and employer to help both parties through the ADA interactive and accommodation process to ensure the employee can effectively and safely perform his or her job. The best part of this book is that the employee can share the information contained in the book with the employer!

Working with employers and employees has given me a lot of insight on how important it is for the employee to understand the ADA interactive and accommodation process. The more the employee understand his or her rights and responsibilities under the ADA (and the employer's rights and responsibilities), the more effective the outcome is for both parties. Since an employee may not have an opportunity to work with an ADA Facilitator in the workplace, I want to provide an employee with the basic understanding and guidance as it relates to the ADA and employment so that an employee can create a better outcome when discussing and requesting a job accommodation with the employer.

This book will help an employee if:

  1. The employer is inexperienced in dealing with the ADA and request for accommodations;
  2. The employer has some knowledge regarding the ADA but does not quite know how to effectively manage the process with him or her to come up with an effective accommodation(s); or
  3. The  employer has an ADA Policy and procedure in place.

My goal is to help employees with chronic health conditions feel more confident and more educated when discussing and requesting an accommodation from his or her employer. After reading the book, the employee may come to the following realization:

  1. The employee has a covered ADA disability, and there are possible accommodation options that the employee can discuss with his or her employer; 
  2. The employee realizes that they may need to discuss other possible job opportunities with his or her employer that they are qualified to perform because the employee can no longer perform the current job functions with or without an accommodation; 
  3. The employee needs to look for other job opportunities elsewhere in which he or she are qualified to perform;
  4. The employee needs to get additional training in an area that better accommodates his or her ADA disability so the employee can successful and safely perform the job functions; or
  5. The ADA law does not apply to the employee.

Regardless of the outcome, understanding the law, the processes, and how it relates to the employee's specific ADA disability, will empower employees to be more effective in their discussions with their employer and help them make better decisions about their current job and career.

story:
I think this is such a great story and i think kids could fall in love with this character. Who in this case is not made up, and thats what differentiates this story from others stories. The fact that this story is so outrageous but true makes it so much more awesome, and I could make him into a household name. I want to give kids an awesome story that is unique and true. Emilio has the potential to become a series, and that is my ultimate goal. 

 

About six years ago i was on the road with a rock band from Massachusetts. We were out in Illinois and had met up with some of our Radio DJ friends at the time. They had a small cabin out in the middle of nowhere that we were going to stay at for the next week. Everything in this cabin....was pretty much dated back to the 80's. There was no wifi, any sort of cell phone reception, there was no cable, but there was a VHS player hooked up to what i remember was a 15" TV with 6 obscure titled movies. But!! there was this awesome little duckling that our friends had rescued that same week from a bunch of coyotes that got the rest of his family. So we decided wed hang out with him seeing there was nothing much else to do. 

We came very attached to this bird. So attached that giving him back was out of the question. So the DJ;s came to our show in Peoria and was expecting to get Emilio back but we had decided he was coming with us on the road. Knowing that he was in good hands they said their goodbyes and thats when the real adventure begun!! 

 

Please help this story come alive. I think it teaches some valuable lessons in life, and just sends total positive vibes to parents and readers.

story:
Flowers for donald is a book of digital collage work I began producing as a response to the US election and the spectacle and dysfunction that America has been enduring since. 
To be most honest, I wish the circumstances behind the making of this work didn’t exist, and that I had never been compelled to make these in the first place. However, the project has been both a means to cope and a reflection on the nature of our new America and the remarkable absurdity that defines it. When this storm of history has passed, I hope that this book may serve as a testament to the time when America’s wheels fell off.
We would love to have your backing to bring this book to life, and we would greatly appreciate whatever contribution you can make. 
 
Thanks for your support!
Gregory Eddi Jones



 


SHORT SUMMARY

Flowers for donald is a series of digital collage works begun in the days following the 2016 U.S. election. The work borrows the symbolic potency of flowers to act as anchor points of protest, memorial, and reflexive connotations of enduring beauty within the traditions of art history.

Each Flowers image originates from a stock photograph of a vase of flowers, and undergoes a process of a stream-of-conscious re-authorship; engaging in digital mark-making, manipulation, and web appropriation. The resulting images convey frantic image-logics and blatant artifice as a strategy of visual criticism by attempting, and failing, to enact spectacle that exceeds the power of exhibitionism that defines the presidency, and existence, of Donald Trump.

While the aesthetics and strategies of Flowers reflect the destabilization of contemporary political and media spheres, and the fast-shifting values of truth and integrity in a Trumpian America, the ultimate and self-guided failures of Flowers for donald point towards the limits of art as a force for cultural well-being.

Within the vein of Jones’ Dadist antecedents, Flowers for donald challenges the role and function of art itself in politically turbulent times. Ultimately, the deepest layers of Flowers exist as testament to the confines of art, and a realization that critical art work which seeks to mirror its social context is restricted to reflection; within which the visions cannot be touched, grasped, or altered; only witnessed.

Flowers for donald is comprised of 20 images and a poem entitled countries glorious, by Gregory Eddi Jones and Donald Trump. 


BIO

​Flowers for donald is the second artists’ book by American artist, writer, and publisher Gregory Eddi Jones. Jones’ first book, Another Twenty-Six Gas Stations, is held in over three-dozen institutional artists’ book and photobook collections in the United States, including libraries at Museum of Modern Art, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Brooklyn Museum of Art, Yale University, and the George Eastman Museum. The title was shortlisted for the Athens Photo Festival in 2015, and was included in two iterations of the exhibition Ed Ruscha: Books and Co, at Gagosian Galleries in Paris and Beverly Hills.

 

BOOK FEATURES

Author: Gregory Eddi Jones
Published by: Urbanautica Institute
Edition: 100 copies, hand numbered copies
1st book (Flowers for donald)
Pages: 24
Size: 20 x 23,5 cm
Paper: Symbol Tatami White of 135 grs. inside, and 250 grs. on the cover
Binding: Saddle stitch binding
2nd book (countries glorious)
Pages: 24
Paper: Arcoprint milk 120gr
Size: 15 x 18 cm
Binding: Saddle stitch binding.

 

FUNDING THE BOOK

The requested amount will go entirely to cover the printing costs and to send the rewards.
If the crowdfunding campaign is successful, the book will be published by Urbanautica Institute and printed in Italy next February 2018.
 

 

LINKS

Earlier versions of the project have been featured on:

Humble Arts Foundation

VICE Creator's Project

Art Slant

Musée Magazine

L'oeil de la Photographie 

Digital America

Urbanautica Journal

 

CONTACT

info@urbanauticainstitute.com
www.urbanauticainstitute.com 

Follow us on Urbanautica, on Facebook and Instagram. We will keep on posting news, new pictures, and maybe some videos...

story:
FALSE CONFESSIONS 

The true story of an ex-cop's crusade against the Orwellian polygraph industry.  This book tells the fascinating story of an ex-cop's crusade against the charlatans and thugs in the polygraph industry.  It takes you on Doug's dangerous journey from the White House to the police department and federal prison and stops along the way at CBS, 60 Minutes, the US Congress and to hundreds of radio, television, news and talk shows.  

This compelling story needs to be told.  For the first time in this crusade of four decades, I am asking for your help.  I believe that it is extremely important to let contributors know exactly what the donations will provide.  Let me point out that this is not just about publishing and promotional expenses for a remarkable book that tells the whole story of the dark world of the lie detection industry's collusion against American citizens.  It is a lot more the that...it is about a mission.  A mission that takes us anywhere someone has been victimized by this barbaric testing and directly to the U.S. Capitol where we will complete our historic legislation to protect people from becoming victims.

Because of the broad range of this effort there will be extensive costs.  These include editing, publishing and promoting the book.   Costs will include travel and lodging for promoting this project.  As we gather momentum there will be demands for personal appearances and additional publishing of books.  There will also be a need for legal representation.

I am not financially supported by any government agency or private organization.  I am as independent as the American spirit is meant to be.  This is why I am asking for all the independent thinkers for their support.

I am humbled by every prayer, every person, and every contribution.  I am truly sincere when I say, Thank You.

WHERE ARE WE GOING FROM HERE

In 1988 myself and others testified in front of Congress which led to the enactment of the EPPA (Employee Polygraph Protection Act).  This gave protection to employees and potential employees from having to submit to polygraph tests.  Unfortunately, this did not include any government employees (Federal, State or Local).  It also did not exempt anyone that was contracting with the government.  

Therefore, the crusade continues until no person is subjected to this test that has proven to be fallible.  Especially for those women that have reported being sexually assaulted and have been submitted to the indignity of having to prove their claim by taking a polygraph (in most all circumstances these tests are administered by a male).   The results of the test may challenge the veracity of the subject's statement thereby affecting whether or not charges will be brought against the accused.  Remember, these tests are FALLIBLE.

FALSE CONFESSIONS

                                                                     PROLOGUE

 

     In 1982, the "Green River Killer" defied capture as his murderous rampage left numerous victims in his wake.  The community of King County near Seattle, Washington demanded capture of the predator, and the police responded by forming a special task force to ensure his capture.  They asked for assistance from anyone in the area who had possible information.  Melvin Wayne Foster, a 43-year old cab driver, responded to their request with suspicions he had about some of his fellow cab drivers.  But, it was Mr. Foster, himself, who caught their attention and fit their "profile."  Their evidence?  Without a doubt, the most damning evidence against him came from the results of a lie detector test administered by police to Foster.  He failed.  Bingo.  They had their man.  

     Although he denied any involvement in the murders, Foster became the prime suspect in the Green River case.  Twice, the police searched his home.  They collected hair and blood samples from him.  No physical evidence was found.  They had an undecover officer purchase a car Foster had advertised for sale.  They dissected it and sent it off for testing.  This quest for evidence, too, provided nothing.  They placed him under twenty-four hour surveillance for several months.  Nothing.  But, the polygraph test results upon which they relied so heavily provided everything.  Absolutely everything...for the real murderer, Mr. Gary Ridgeway.....

     .....Ample time, unfettered opportunity, and unobstructed movement as he continued his horrific labors as the Green River Killer.

     Although Gary Leon Ridgway confessed to seventy-one killings, he is presumed to be responsible for more than ninety.  Ultimately, he was convicted of forty-nine separate murders;  thus, making him the most prolific serial killer in U.S. history.

     Tragically, nineteen of the murders committed by Ridgeway took place during the time that police officials intently focused their attention upon an innocent man, Melvin Foster.  And, why?  Because a simple polygraph test had told them that Foster had lied.  

     Finally, in 1985, forensic science completely ruled out Melvin Foster as a suspect or person of interest with any connection to the Green River killings.  Ironically, the murderer, Gary Ridgeway, had actually passed an initial polygraph test;  however, the results were later overturned by the FBI.  Despite the fact that Ridgeway was ultimately convicted of forty-nine separate crimes, it provided no consolation for the victims.  Their lives were over.  

    This incredible incident is not so much about Melvin Foster failing the polygraph as it is about the failure of the polygraph, itself.  A fallable machine failed nineteen young women...all the way to their graves.

     The horrific consequences in thousands of cases resulting from the use of the polygraph machine became the inspiration for Doug Williams to enter into his life-long Crusade to bring an end to the use of this insidious device.  His journey - and, each small step along the way - is an attempt to right a terrible wrong prevalent in our society today, and to prevent such egregious errors from continuing to ruin the lives of unsuspecting victims like Melvin Foster who fall prey to a machine that, quite simply, cannot tell right from wrong.

ABOUT DOUG WILLIAMS

  • Started his career in the military as a White House Aide.  This entailed taking the daily intelligence reports and hand-delivering to the President of the United States (Both Johnson & Nixon)
  • Bachelor of Science from Oklahoma City University
  • Ten years in the Oklahoma City Police Department.  Seven years as the polygraph interrogator

CONTACT INFO

To view interviews of Doug with 60 Minutes, Bloomberg etc., please visit www.polygraph.com

Doug looks forward to answering any further questions you may have or share any comments.  

doug@polygraph.com

FALSE CONFESSIONS 
The true story of an ex-cop's crusade against the Orwellian polygraph industry.  This book tells the fascinating story of an ex-cop's crusade against the charlatans and thugs in the polygraph industry.  It takes you on Doug's dangerous journey from the White House to the police department and federal prison and stops along the way at CBS, 60 Minutes, the US Congress and to hundreds of radio, television, news and talk shows.  
This compelling story needs to be told.  For the first time in this crusade of four decades, I am asking for your help.  I believe that it is extremely important to let contributors know exactly what the donations will provide.  Let me point out that this is not just about publishing and promotional expenses for a remarkable book that tells the whole story of the dark world of the lie detection industry's collusion against American citizens.  It is a lot more the that...it is about a mission.  A mission that takes us anywhere someone has been victimized by this barbaric testing and directly to the U.S. Capitol where we will complete our historic legislation to protect people from becoming victims.
Because of the broad range of this effort there will be extensive costs.  These include editing, publishing and promoting the book.   Costs will include travel and lodging for promoting this project.  As we gather momentum there will be demands for personal appearances and additional publishing of books.  There will also be a need for legal representation.
I am not financially supported by any government agency or private organization.  I am as independent as the American spirit is meant to be.  This is why I am asking for all the independent thinkers for their support.
I am humbled by every prayer, every person, and every contribution.  I am truly sincere when I say, Thank You.
WHERE ARE WE GOING FROM HERE
In 1988 myself and others testified in front of Congress which led to the enactment of the EPPA (Employee Polygraph Protection Act).  This gave protection to employees and potential employees from having to submit to polygraph tests.  Unfortunately, this did not include any government employees (Federal, State or Local).  It also did not exempt anyone that was contracting with the government.  
Therefore, the crusade continues until no person is subjected to this test that has proven to be fallible.  Especially for those women that have reported being sexually assaulted and have been submitted to the indignity of having to prove their claim by taking a polygraph (in most all circumstances these tests are administered by a male).   The results of the test may challenge the veracity of the subject's statement thereby affecting whether or not charges will be brought against the accused.  Remember, these tests are FALLIBLE.

     Although he denied any involvement in the murders, Foster became the prime suspect in the Green River case.  Twice, the police searched his home.  They collected hair and blood samples from him.  No physical evidence was found.  They had an undecover officer purchase a car Foster had advertised for sale.  They dissected it and sent it off for testing.  This quest for evidence, too, provided nothing.  They placed him under twenty-four hour surveillance for several months.  Nothing.  But, the polygraph test results upon which they relied so heavily provided everything.  Absolutely everything...for the real murderer, Mr. Gary Ridgeway.....
