story:
Creepy Campfire Stories (for Grownups), An Anthology


(Preliminary Book Cover Design)


6/09/15 –UPDATE: WE HIT OUR MID-POST GOAL OF $1300!

We're halfway to our full goal! Today the announcement was made and the Open Call page on EMP's website was updated informing all authors that the Creepy Campfire Anthology will be paying PRO RATES of 6¢ per word, with a max payout of $360 per story! Obviously, the 13 authors who have already been accepted into the antho are very excited; they just got a raise!

The next 50% of our funding goals will go towards raising the word count of the anthology from 65,000 to 75,000 words. However, the antho is currently almost FULL. Realistically, there are only about FOUR more spots left before we'll hit the 65,000 word limit. We've got another $1300 to go before we reach 100% funding. Doing the calculations at 6¢ per word, for every 25% further funding raised, we can add another 5000 words onto the antho, and accept another 1-2 authors (depending on their story lengths).

If, on the off-chance, we actually go beyond 100% funding, any further funds raised would then be used to determine the flat rate fee (if any) per story that EMP Publishing can afford to pay authors on the launch of either the second annual Creepy Campfire Stories (for Grownups), 2016, OR the Creepy Campfire Stories Quarterly Digest, depending on how far over 100% we can reach.

THANK YOU so much to everyone who has contributed so far, and ordered a copy of the anthology, or a book and SWAG!! We are so excited to send those contributors their fun Creepy goodies in October!!

END OF UPDATE

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Greetings from EMP Publishing and Managing Editor Jennifer Word. To view the Open Call for this anthology project, please visit the EMP website here.

EMP is a new, independently owned publishing company, based in Los Angeles County, Los Angeles, California, USA. Our team is growing, and we'd like to begin offering publishing opportunities to writers of modern day horror. Being new to the game, EMP has little start-up capital, but big dreams. We have just launched our first Open Call for submissions for the Anthology collection 'Creepy Campfire Stories (for Grownups)', but we're new, so we can only pay our authors 4¢ per word. We'd love to up our pay to the true professional rate of 6¢ per word. This would also allow horror writers who are published in the anthology to count their publishing credit towards acceptance into the HWA (Horror Writer's Association).

If we could raise enough funding, we'd also love to raise the word count of the book from 65,000 to 85,000 at 6¢ per word, to accept and showcase even more writers in the anthology. You can help us make struggling horror writers' dreams come true.

We are currently slated and funded to publish a book of 65,000 words in length, at 4¢ per word. We need to raise a mid-post goal total of $1,300, in order to increase the writers' pay the extra 2¢ per word to reach professional rates. Increasing the book's length by an additional 20,000 words accounts for the secondary goal post of $2,600. That is where the goal amount we've chosen stems directly from. There is no profit for EMP in this campaign. All the money raised will go directly to the authors themselves, to reward them for their talent and hard work.

If you are a supporter of the writing community, or simply the creative arts, we hope that you will support this campaign and make it possible for EMP Publishing to pay talented horror writers today what they truly deserve. We'd appreciate your help in supporting the hardworking and talented, yet under-appreciated horror writers out there who are struggling and mostly being paid nothing, many times, not even a contributor's copy. We'd like to change that.

Thank you so much for considering support of this project. If you are a horror reader and book fan, consider supporting this campaign (and the future selected authors of the anthology) by ordering a paperback copy, or Kindle e-version of this title.


Risks & Challenges

This anthology will be published, so there's ZERO risk. The anthology will be released on Tuesday, October 20, 2015.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, we totally understand that, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please consider helping us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • If you know any horror writers who might be interested in submitting, share the open call page from our EMP website.

And that's all there is to it.

And now the Creepy Swag Preview (see Perks):

Creepy Giant Bookmark Front

Creepy Giant Bookmark Back

Creepy Mouse Pad

Creepy Notebook

Creepy Tote Bag

Creepy Thank You Note Card

story:
Goobye Mon Amour - Da dove nasce

Avete presente quelle serate tra amici di puri ragionamenti esistenziali? Tra una birra ed un amaro raccontandosi progetti e prospettive future?

Saranno stati i fumi dell'alcol o più semplicemente  un'insieme di idee che insieme hanno preso senso, nell'arco di una serata è nata un'idea. Una bozza di trama.. e la voglia di farla diventare una storia.
In 2 per giunta, perchè scrivere a 4 mani non è una cosa da tutti i giorni.
I due in questione sono Simone Bellucci, che sembra abbia preso una laurea in Ingegneria e per evitare di farsi sommergere dai numeri ha ben pensato di scrivere un libro, e Luca Marinangeli, che invece scrittore e poeta lo è ormai da un po', anche se il libretto universitario lo etichetta come laureando in Economia.

Perchè una campagna su IndieGoGo

Abbiamo scelto di toglierci dalle logiche del mercato dell'editoria.

Vogliamo che il nostro libro sia apprezzato (o criticato) dai lettori prima che dai singoli editori che si affidano sui nomi forti. Per questo motivo chiediamo a te, lettore, di darci un piccolo contributo, per riuscire a dimostrare che è il pubblico stesso a scegliere cosa va e cosa non va. Non deve essere indirizzato verso un genere o un altro.

L'importanza del Crowfunding

Riuscire a finanziare totalmente questa campagna significherebbe autopubblicare per la prima volta (in Italia) non un book fotografico, un fumetto o un docu-libro, ma un romanzo. La rilevanza su base nazionale e internazionale sarebbe incredibile, così come il forte messaggio verso chi si affida ancora a logiche vecchie.

Aiutereste noi , si, ma tutti i novelli scrittori si affaccerebbero a queste nuove possiblità.

La logica dell'insuccesso

In questa "avventura" noi ci mettiamo in gioco. Voi, credendo in noi, fate altrettanto.

Il libro non è lungo, può essere letto con facilità durante un bel viaggio in treno (di quelli Roma - Milano senza il Frecciarossa 1000 ovviamente) e così è stato pensato. Un compagno di viaggio che proprio di viaggio parla.

Se (vi) piacerà, non diventeremo famosi o  ricchi, ma saremo realizzati... e voi ci avrete aiutato a non lasciare un piccolo sogno (e letteralmente un libro) nel cassetto.

Se non (vi) piacerà... poco male! Forse non è questa la nostra strada, ma almeno avremo aperto la via a scrittori più talentuosi di noi.


Come altro ci potete aiutare?

Sia che decidiate di aiutarci economicamente (grazie già da ora) sia che non vi vada o  non possiate diventare "cofondatori" di questa opera, vi chiediamo di condividere il progetto.

Twitter, Facebook, Instagram o qualsiasi altro social vogliate utilizzare (anche Tinder... perchè no?) ci permetterà di raggiungere una platea più ampia e far si che più persone possano aiutarci.



N.B.
Questa è una campagna Flessibile. Cosa significa? Che è possibile finanziarla anche se non raggiungerà la quota finale. Tuttavia, se non dovessimo raggiungere la quota di 1500 € entro i 60 giorni, restituiremo a ogni funder il quantitativo versato.
#goodbyemonamour

La rilevanza su base nazionale e internazionale sarebbe incredibile, così come il forte messaggio verso chi si affida ancora a logiche vecchie.
Aiutereste noi , si, ma tutti i novelli scrittori si affaccerebbero a queste nuove possiblità.
    La logica dell'insuccesso In questa "avventura" noi ci mettiamo in gioco. Voi, credendo in noi, fate altrettanto.
Il libro non è lungo, può essere letto con facilità durante un bel viaggio in treno (di quelli Roma - Milano senza il Frecciarossa 1000 ovviamente) e così è stato pensato. Un compagno di viaggio che proprio di viaggio parla.
Se (vi) piacerà, non diventeremo famosi o  ricchi, ma saremo realizzati... e voi ci avrete aiutato a non lasciare un piccolo sogno (e letteralmente un libro) nel cassetto.
Se non (vi) piacerà... poco male! Forse non è questa la nostra strada, ma almeno avremo aperto la via a scrittori più talentuosi di noi.

    Come altro ci potete aiutare?
Sia che decidiate di aiutarci economicamente (grazie già da ora) sia che non vi vada o  non possiate diventare "cofondatori" di questa opera, vi chiediamo di condividere il progetto.
Twitter, Facebook, Instagram o qualsiasi altro social vogliate utilizzare (anche Tinder... perchè no?) ci permetterà di raggiungere una platea più ampia e far si che più persone possano aiutarci.




N.B.Questa è una campagna Flessibile. Cosa significa? Che è possibile finanziarla anche se non raggiungerà la quota finale. Tuttavia, se non dovessimo raggiungere la quota di 1500 € entro i 60 giorni, restituiremo a ogni funder il quantitativo versato.
#goodbyemonamour

story:
The money raised in this will assist with the purchase of the USB drives needed to distribute the file, as well as the delivery costs.

Created from my various blogs, musings and photography through the years, this (over a full gigabyte!) PDF is in its final stages at this time.

As you may know, I am leaving China after a year and a half here for the USA where I will visit family and friends in the next couple months on both coastlines.

I'd love to be able to share this (over 250 pages!) document that I've spent so many thousands of hours preparing for your enjoyment.

story:
La locura de esta teoría consiste en creer que es posible vivir de una manera diferente. Vivir explorando la manera de hacer lo que amamos hacer,  y con la intención de conseguir que no sólo nos beneficie a nosotros mismos. Nosotros no nos enorgullecemos del sentido común tal y como se ha construido, ni tampoco de tener los pies en el suelo. 

Para exploradores, artistas, académicos o estudiantes. Para crear cosas, o resolverlas. Queremos diseñar un cuaderno útil, sencillo y duradero. La última hoja no será nunca más la última hoja. Podrás recargarlo para renovar o sustituir su funcionalidad. Y además, ofrecerá una alternativa para conservar tus mejores ideas en formato digital. 




Es importante que pueda integrarse con nuestros hábitos urbanos, o con las experiencias que vivimos mientras cruzamos mares y montañas. Un cuaderno para las aventuras, historias, y proyectos que quedan por descubrir. 

Con un propósito social. Nos preocupamos por impulsar la industria local (producción y compra) en nuestro país, y contribuiremos a la investigación contra el cáncer infantil a través de la fundación La sonrisa de Alex y el Instituto de Salud Carlos III de Madrid.


La cubierta del cuaderno está diseñada en cuero de vacuno engrasado de más de 2 mm de espesor, lo que ofrece belleza y durabilidad. Si conseguimos el objetivo ofreceremos dos alternativas de color: Marrón y negro. 

Una de las características más interesantes de este tipo de material es la personalidad que adquiere con el uso. Cuanto más lo uses, más personal será.

Tornillos de latón. Para conseguir mantener las hojas seguras, utilizamos tornillos de unión junto con una varilla de metacrilato grabada con láser. Esta manera de sujetar el papel nos permite recargarlo y extraer las hojas de manera sencilla y segura. Sólo tenemos que girar los tornillos hasta que podamos sacar el papel.

Amamos la naturaleza, por este motivo utilizamos papel reciclado de primera calidad. Con un grosor aproximado de 100gr. En el siguiente video podemos ver cómo realizamos el corte para nuestros prototipos.



TAMAÑOS Y RECARGAS

Nos gustaría crear dos tamaños diferentes: Bolsillo y Escritorio. Ofrecer varias alternativas relacionadas con el papel y con la funcionalidad de cada recarga. Queremos ofrecer una usabilidad actualizada para las actividades de hoy en día.




DIGITAL

Podrás conservar tus ideas en formato digital. Habilitaremos desde nuestra web la opción de enviarnos el contenido de tu cuaderno y recibirlo en formato digital en tu ordenador. 

Tenemos que demostrar que es posible vivir haciendo lo que amas hacer, y que es posible ganar dinero como un resultado de tu pasión, no como un propósito en sí mismo. Queremos mejorar el mundo que nos rodea, vemos las cosas desde otro punto de vista. 

Este producto está fabricado de manera artesanal, impulsando la industria local y con procesos socialmente responsables. Este tipo de materiales, y técnicas de trabajo, conllevan unos costes, y necesitamos tu ayuda para hacerlo realidad. 

No vamos a arreglar el mundo, pero vamos a soñar con la idea de conseguir mejorarlo un poquito.



Los plazos para la producción y envío de los cuadernos seguirán una línea temporal aproximada a estas fechas. Si no se llega a la cantidad programada el dinero será devuelto a cada contribuyente.





Nuestro esfuerzo se centra en conseguir que un producto que ya existe ofrezca un diseño y usabilidad renovadas. Utilizando materiales accesibles, y con la colaboración de proveedores de confianza, hemos asegurado lo mejor posible la viabilidad de un proyecto que gracias a nuestros patrocinadores se hará realidad. 

Aunque algunos de los riesgos que asumimos son impredecibles, utilizamos múltiples maneras de asegurar en cada uno de los pasos (producción y distribución) la seguridad del proyecto. 

Una de las ventajas competitivas de nuestro humilde proyecto es el contacto cara a cara con nuestros contribuyentes, resolviendo lo antes posible cualquier problema que pueda ocurrir.

Tenemos una ilusión enorme por crear un herramienta que nos permita ser mejor de lo que somos, o reflexionar sobre lo que nos rodea. Y sabemos que será también la herramienta que permitirá a nuestros patrocinadores alcanzar sus propias aspiraciones.


¡Gracias por el tiempo invertido en conocer nuestro proyecto!
¡Muchas gracias!

story:
My Little Light children's yoga poem book

Written by Sarah Granato

Illustrated by Nova Stanley

  • There are many benefits to yoga for kids! The practice of yoga helps kids find relaxation and peace, improve health and concentration, as well as body awareness and appreciation. This book is an introduction to those principles through poetry and pictures. This book also uses poetry as a tool of storytelling which introduces rhythm and imagery.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am raising $7,000
  • These funds pay for creation of the book, publishing, marketing, materials for packaging, shipping to yoga studios and bookstores worldwide, shipping to publishing companies, legal fees as well as distribution. 
  • My goal is to have My Little Light children's yoga poem book on the bookshelves in every yoga studio, independent book store as well as major chains.
  • If I do not reach my entire goal I will make sure everyone who has donated in order to receive a copy of the book will get their book. 

The Impact

The benefits of reading to your children, yoga and poetry are abundant. This book is an outstanding tool to bring these gifts to your family.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute financially please just spread the word through social media! Thank you so much!!

Who I am

I am a mama of 2, writer and yoga instructor with specialties in Prenatal Yoga (Integral Yoga Institute, NYC) and Kid's Yoga (Karma Kid's Yoga, NYC). My Little Light is a perfect union of those passions and I'm so excited to share it with families and kids worldwide!

Illustrator Bio

Nova Fiona Stanley is a young artist growing up in Brooklyn NY. She turns 13 November 2016. Nova spends most of her time drawing, painting, animating, playing violin and ukulele, singing and song writing. Her art is mostly self taught through observation but is grateful for the mentorship of artists Theo Stanley, Melanie Paterson and Cecile Dyer. She is the eldest of four and hopes her younger sisters will enjoy this book. Nova is honored to have the opportunity to illustrate for this very special project.

story:
Short Summary

Four Freedom Publishing was founded in 2015 with a specific mandate to publish books that will create discussion, promote new writers and deliver quality writing to smart readers. We publish fiction, nonfiction, poetry, drama and children's books.

Now, we are ready to expand. Because we need to add staff in both Editorial and Marketing - we create jobs! - we are asking you to help subsidize training and start-up costs. Anything you choose to donate will directly assist new employees, and indirectly assist our writers.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking you for $6750. That will allow Four Freedom Publishing to add one full-time Marketing Assistant and one contract Editor.

The cost of a top Editor ranges between $1500-$3000 per book and we want our writers to deliver the best possible work to you, the reader. Similarly, we need a great Marketing Assistant to get the word out about our books. You can write and we can publish the greatest novel ever written, but if no one knows about it, what's the point?

In return for your financial support we will Thank You by sending you books, including you in the Acknowledgements of one of our books, or we can even offer you a full page in a book to promote your own business, work or charity.

The Impact

Your support will make a real, positive difference in people's lives. And by that, we don't just mean the new staff members, or even just the writers they will work with. Four Freedom Publishing is dedicated to publishing works that make this world better. The name of our company was chosen from Franklin Roosevelt's Four Freedoms address to Congress in 1941. President Roosevelt defined those values  which modern civilization should embrace; broadly stated, he defined Human Rights. The books we publish stand for those virtues.

Risks & Challenges

Publishing is a difficult business even in the best of times. In 2015 there were nearly one million books released either by traditional publishers or self-published. And that is just in English.

Everyone can create a great cover. Everyone can tweet. Everyone can write a blurb or ad that can grab your attention. It is hard to separate the music from the noise.

We accept the challenge to make our writers heard, because we believe in quality and we believe in our mandate. All we ask is that you help make our voice a little louder and we can do the rest.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot give money, we understand. Please spread the word. Share our message in Social Media. If you have a blog and would like more information, we're more than happy to sit down and answer any questions. For that matter, if you're working on a great book yourself, we definitely want to talk to you! Because it is fpr people like you that we have created this company and created this campaign.

story:
Gods are Gamers, is the result of these suggestions. Through all of my investigations into spiritual ideas and philosophy, it became apparent that there was always a similar theme towards all of the varying books that were already out there, and that maybe there was a place for a more relaxed and disarming approach to the same ideas. Through the use of pop-culture, humour (and for this particular theme), a few gaming references. I feel that metaphysical & spiritual philosophy could be explained without seeming to ‘un-approachable’ to those who have an interest in these ideas, but may become deterred from a title or book cover that seems too ‘enlightened’ for them at that time. I feel that by using less of a mystical/fluffy feel and replacing that with more of a sci-fi and grounded approach, the same ideas can be shared. Really, it is just one of many different roads to the same destination.


I have always felt that any person can learn or understand anything, yet there are different approaches that work better for different people. There is no guaranteed method of relaying any kind of ideas or information that works for everyone. There are many books incorporated under the ‘New Age’ banner that talk about this subject through the use of Angels, Spirits, Understanding Your Own Power, Laws of Attraction, The Secrets to Life, and so on… but i feel that the option to approach a way into such ideas should be available to all, and i hope to fill an opening that has been around for a while.


Gods are Gamers  is a look at life from a different tangent of the ‘Metaphysical/Spiritual’’ point of view. The book starts from a pre-birth idea and moves through different stages of life and sharing a humorous, yet insightful look at this crazy house we call Earth. Even though this book is written in fun and disarming manner, there are actual Spiritual teachings that could certainly be of use if trying to understand the meaning of life. This book is written with wisdom and life affirming issues, but these things can easily be described in a way that appeals to Teenagers and Adults alike, if you are into Gaming, Sci-Fi, Fantasy or Pop-Culture whilst not minding a little splattering of adult language, yet have an interest in matters of a contemporary philosophy regarding thoughts of a Spiritual/Metaphysical/New Age nature, then this should appeal to those who are open to these ideas, yet may not have taken up other options... However it can also appeal to those who already have an interest in such matters, but like to investigate different perspectives.


Example chapter titles include:

Why The Game Exists, Creating Your Character

Fear Not My Friend

The Games Great Players

Welcome To The Neighbourhood, and many more.


The types of thoughts and questions that i aim to share some are based around aspects of life.


Why are we here?

Is this planet the only experience open to us?

Is there a reason to why Earth is so difficult?

Are we the only species in the Universe?

What choices do we actually have?


I would like to say something about the cover design for this book. The artist/graphic designer who has done this cover is my friend for many years, who similar to me had a skill that wasn’t being used to its full potential. he has always been good at illustration, but had never produced anything outside of drawings in a sketchbook. I had pulled him into this project in an effort to realise that if I could produce a project with no prior inclination to do so, then so could he. It should be said that he didn't fully appreciate the task that was at hand. With no prior experience or knowledge of Graphic Design applications, he learnt everything from scratch and almost gave up on ever doing this kind of work again, so appreciation and respect should go towards the mammoth task that was undertook in his spare time only.


I was a total amateur at writing, and never intended to write books at all, but when two total strangers of the psychic medium type (now three since finishing the project), have all said “You have books to write”, a person should pay attention to this information and should follow through… whilst dragging your mate with you.


I am looking to raise a fund of £6000.00. This money would be used in the following way. 

£1000.00 will be allocated to cover the costs of the illustration and graphics for the book cover and back cover design. (and the stress that i caused him)

£1500.00 towards editing and page layout costs. 

£1500,00 towards the initial printing costs and print run, 

The remainder (after Indiegogo expenses), will be £500 towards web-page and e-commerce setup and maintenance, and the rest towards marketing, and any advertising payments.


By the end of the fund, the estimated postage of the book will be November 2016.


If the fund does not reach the desired total, any proceeds will go towards a more limited print run and stripped down or delayed actions regarding the other aspects.


Any help with sharing this page to enable a broader spread  of people would be much appreciated. Indiegogo’s own sharing tools are available.


I hope that this project pique's the interest of those who have been good enough to look at my pitch, and can enable this book get out into the world and potentially help anyone who may feel that this existence is a strange experience (crazy house),, and would appreciate a little insight to help move forward a little easier.


My thanks to you all for any support that is kindly offered


Chris Shapcott.

(and the stress that i caused him)£1500.00 towards editing and page layout costs. £1500,00 towards the initial printing costs and print run, The remainder (after Indiegogo expenses), will be £500 towards web-page and e-commerce setup and maintenance, and the rest towards marketing, and any advertising payments.By the end of the fund, the estimated postage of the book will be November 2016.If the fund does not reach the desired total, any proceeds will go towards a more limited print run and stripped down or delayed actions regarding the other aspects.Any help with sharing this page to enable a broader spread  of people would be much appreciated. Indiegogo’s own sharing tools are available.I hope that this project pique's the interest of those who have been good enough to look at my pitch, and can enable this book get out into the world and potentially help anyone who may feel that this existence is a strange experience (crazy house),, and would appreciate a little insight to help move forward a little easier. My thanks to you all for any support that is kindly offeredChris Shapcott.

story:
“I am an invisible man. No, I am not a spook like those who haunted Edgar Allan Poe; nor am I one of your Hollywood-movie ectoplasms. I am a man of substance, of flesh and bone, fiber and liquids -- and I might even be said to possess a mind. I am invisible, understand, simply because people refuse to see me.” – Ralph Ellison, Invisible Man, p. 3

 

SUMMARY OF THE CAMPAIGN

In 1952, famed author Ralph Ellison penned the fictional classic, Invisible Man, chronicling the challenges of early twentieth century life in America for her citizens of color. In its gripping and often gritty depiction of the travails of a college educated, young black man who often felt himself unnoticed from the rest of society, this literary masterpiece helped to shed light on the harsh realities that most black males face each and every day—from the womb, to the tomb—as they are forced to swim against the tide of negative public perception, institutional disadvantage, and creative disenfranchisement, further stacking the odds of success against them.

Trapped in the alternate reality of being “seen, but not seen," present but unaccounted—and in many aspects unaccountable—Ellison’s work shined a spotlight to the plight of blacks in America. Today, however, more than sixty years since the book’s release marked a watershed moment for a slowly evolving society, many argue that very little has changed for the plight of America’s black males. And, in many instances, the reversal of fortunes has occurred as black men continue to lose ground and get left behind in today’s changing global marketplace.

In fact, for many years now, America has known that the oftentimes overwhelming challenges facing black men have consequences that affect us all. One of these problems, unfortunately, is the disappearance of productive black men from the communities that need them most. For example, the ratio of black men to black women is shockingly out of balance. Some of the leading reasons for this glaring absence include unusually high death and incarceration rates, among others.

In 1965, the United States Department of Labor released a report entitled: “The Negro Family: The Case for National Action.” In it, the federal government argued that the U.S. was underestimating the damage done to black families by “three centuries of sometimes unimaginable mistreatment” as well as a “racist virus in the American blood stream,” which would continue to plague blacks in the future.

Today, some fifty-plus years since this report was released, the predictions laid bare in the "Moynihan Report"(as it is commonly known) continue to serve as a harbinger of things to come for the public at large if changes aren't made quickly. From an economic perspective, one of the biggest problems facing black males, which also has a  direct impact on the pocketbooks and purse strings of ALL Americans, is the issue of mass incarceration and the overpopulation ofAfrican American males in the criminal justice system. In fact, U.S. taxpayers spend $39 billion per year for prison operations, further reducing our collective capacity to arrest this problem through greater investments in education, job creation and economic development.  Furthermore, an unintended consequence of the cradle to  prison pipeline that exists for African American men, is the lingering economic impact on their immediate families and, by extension, all families, further exacerbating this uniquely American crisis. Moreover, with the declining number of marriageable men in the African American community, along with high rates of homicide, AIDS-related deaths and other factors, the substantial imbalance in the male-female ratio, the disappearance of these men has far-reaching implications.

Something must be done, and it is important that each of us, regardless of race, do our part to eliminate the problem!

 

WHAT MAKES THE BOOK DIFFERENT

Each chapter of Still Invisible? will not only feature the shared experiences of African American males struggling simply survive from day to day, it will also provide the reader with the tools and resources they need to accurately and factually contextualize the issues facing black men, while taking into account the attitudes and perspectives of those who may not have a complete understanding of their daily reality.

Special sections at the end of each chapter include:
 

EVERYBODY'S GOT ONE
In this section, we will examine the opinions and widely held beliefs and assumptions of many in society, as it pertains to their overall views of black males in America. As a part of this discussion, we will explore stereotypes, taboos and preconceived notions that help to drive the negative narrative attributed to African American men.

 

THOSE PESKY THINGS
Perhaps the most useful resource in this book, this section of each chapter will provide data and statistics addressing each of the issues explored within its pages. Challenging widely held misconceptions about black males in America, such as the erroneous belief that there are more black males in prison than there are in college, or the false narrative that black males are more prone to violence than other members of American society, this section will help to arm the reader with accurate information, facts and empirical evidence that they can use to help reshape a false media narrative designed to sell newspapers and increase advertising dollars, this feature of the book is a "game-changer" in the raging debate of race and culture in America.

 

THE ENVELOPE PLEASE
After considering the opinions and perspectives of others as it relates to their views on black males in EVERYBODY'S GOT ONE,  and providing the requisite facts and figures each reader needs to inform their own perspectives in THOSE PESKY THINGS, we will then offer a cogent and coherent analysis of the issues addressed within each chapter, framing each editorial using the facts divided therein.

 

What the Book includes: 

Still invisible?  is an explosive narrative that examines many of the reasons black males have been left behind in the shadows of the twenty-first century economy and the mainstream of accepted American culture. 

 

List of proposed Chapters:

  • Born with a Birthmark
  • 500 Years of Lynchings
  • From Three Fifths to Sixty - Six Percent
  • The System Isn't Broken
  • Confronting Uncomfortable Stereotypes
  • Niggers, Niggaz , Black and African Americans
  • #CrimingWhileWhite: Acknowledging Racial Privilege
  • The message in the media
  • "The nigger in the White House" ; Post-racial America in the age of Obama.
  • "We can't breathe": Black Men and the Police
  • What Do You Call a Black Man with a Ph.D ?
  • The Impact of Invisibility
  • Not Your Father's Revolution: The Rise of Millenial Leadership
  • A Prescription for Progress

 

Special Features

  • Highlights, quotes and flashbacks from Ralph Ellison's acclaimed novel, Invisible Man
  • In-Depth Interviews with Leading Black Males figures in America on the issues of race and culture
  • Back matter for the book will include an appendix with further resources and recommended reading as well as an index
  • And much, much more.

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET:

We need your help to do an initial print run large enough for everyone who may need to read Still Invisible? or are interested in issues of race, culture and the challenges facing America's Black Males. If we do not reach our goal, we will only be able to print enough for our campaign contributors and supporters. If (and WHEN) we exceed our goal, however, we will use any additional funds to lower the retail price of the book, share complimentary copies with students, and improve our overseas distribution (which is quite expensive).

Here is where your contributions will go: 

  • Overall graphic design $2,000
  • ISBN, copyright, & barcode $500
  • Editors $3,000
  • Insurance, legal fees $500
  • Professional fees $500
  • Travel $1,500
  • Printing and delivery of books $15,000
  • Crowdfunding fees (5%) + Credit card fees (3%) $2,000
  • TOTAL: $25,000

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP:

AS you can imagine, marketing and promoting a book without the financial support of a major publishing house can be a daunting task. We do not have an advertising budget. But we have YOU... and that means EVERYTHING to the success of this project. As such, we are relying on social media and word of mouth to make our campaign and project known. Please tell your friends to visit and share Still Invisible? on Facebook, Twitter, and  our website: www.StillTheInvisibleMan.com.

story:
OUR VISION

We believe in the power of constant reminders of peace.

The problem is we take peace for granted. We rarely notice when it’s peaceful – we always notice when it’s not.

27 Steps, a walk for peace, is a deliberate attempt to slow our pace down. 27 years in prison made the Nelson Mandela we know as a leader. As you take one step for each year – you break the cycle of your own life, and allow the old baggage of intolerance, discrimination and racism to melt away.

The 27 Steps monument –  two pyramidal forms with a void down the middle through which visitors walk – will become a traveling peace pavilion, going to a number of cities around the world, and hopefully residing in the Apartheid Museum in South Africa.

At a time when the world is witnessing violence of all sorts and not enough people are talking about it, Mandela's message rings true. We ask that you take these 27 steps with us, listen with your heart, and feel the steps as music, as presence.

 

First Stop - San Francisco, Market Street Prototyping Festival http://marketstreetprototyping.org/2016-festiva...

 

OUR PROCESS

 

Walk the 27 Steps to peace with us.

 

The idea starts here, we start building.

 

Fail, Fail Fast. The devil is in the details. The connection points between the rods for the frame need to be good, real good. We learn.

 

$1 stainless steel shaft as a connector's for the frame? Good things in life are free, almost free.

 

Our first two guest, father and son, take the 27 Steps at iHangar, Palace of Fine Arts in San Francisco. The imaginary pyramids along the tape mark-up witness the opening.

 

Metal Magic fabricators build models. Sometimes 7th time is the charm.

 

It surely takes a village to make 27 Steps happen, our tribe at work.

 

The frame is modular, pre-fabrication at its best. Metal Magic shows us their Magic.

 

I see 27 Steps.

 

Nut, Bolt, Wrench and more Magic from Metal Magic.

 

Weave, Weave, Weave.

 

27 Steps is happening.

Visit 27 Steps to Weave

Take the 27 Steps Pilgrimage

27 Steps is being built at Palace of Fine Arts, San Francisco

story:
Hi, we are Steve and Lizzie and we live in Hampton, Virginia. We sponsor a little boy named Alan who lives in the village of Carmonial in the Dominican Republic. Members of our church are going on a mission trip to the village in August and we would love to be part of the group to be able to minister to the people of the DR. We will get to meet our sponsor child as well as visit many of the people in the village. We will be holding a daily Bible camp for children and would also be building latrines for the village. We are so excited for this opportunity being as it is something we have wanted to do for a while now, and we feel that God is telling us that now is the time.

We would love if you could help us reach out and meet these wonderful people. We need to raise $3,000 by May 20th so that we can both go on this exciting adventure. Please help us and the people of Carmonial, Dominican Republic by donating to our cause, sharing our story, and praying for us. God has an amazing plan for these people. We are so blessed to be part of their lives, and know you will be blessed as well for any help you can offer.

story:
The Book:
 "Unselfish - Love thy Neighbor As Thy Selfie"

Everyone is trying to get noticed. Selfies are taking over the internet. Selfish behavior seems to be at an all-time high. But there are people who do Unselfish things everyday. Acts of kindness that no one notices. Extraordinary sacrifices that don't go viral. This book celebrates just a few of the unsung stories of regular people and celebrities alike going against the grain and helping their fellow man. "Unselfish" will reignite your faith in humanity and may just inspire you to "love thy neighbor as thy selfie".  

"Unselfish" contains 99 stories of people who have been unselfish, along with full-color photos to accompany each story.


WHY NOW?...and The Impact

On May 5, 2015 (just a few days before Mother's Day), an already highly publicized book with the opposite title, "Selfish", will release in bookstores and online worldwide.  We feel there needs to be a counterbalance.  Our goal is to release "Unselfish" the same day - May 5, 2015.

This is not a campaign or a book against any individual or group of individuals.  It is a book and a campaign against the growing culture of selfishness.  And most importantly, it is a celebration of individuals who have looked beyond themselves to help their fellow man.  It is their stories that need to be told - stories of service and unselfishness.

As you read the stories of unselfish acts, and view the pictures that accompany each story, you will be uplifted and inspired.  

Most of the money raised from this campaign will go towards marketing of the book.  The printing costs have been covered for the first print run, so the book will be published.  (Those who contribute will receive their books).  However, in order to spread the unselfish message and provide the opposite view to the book "Selfish", being published the same day, we need to get the word out!  This requires advertising dollars and a marketing team.  

Why IndieGoGo and Why $150,000?

$150,000 would make this the most funded book in the history of IndieGoGo.  Our goal is not to set a record, however.  It is to  publish a book to inspire others, and send a message at the same time - a message that you and I prefer Unselfishness over Selfishness in society.  

We also want to make sure that the stories reach as many people as possible. That's where you and your friends come in.  Please spread the message about this campaign.  We know with your help we can reach this goal.  Let's work together to see Unselfishness triumph over Selfishness!  Help the stories be told across the world!
 (You get a free-copy when you donate to this campaign at the $20.00 perk level and above.)

Risks & Challenges

The stories and photos have been collected.  The book is going to the printer this week.  This project is moving forward. 

The risks would be:

  • Technical glitches.  For the electronic formats, there is always the possibility of technical glitches.  We will address them quickly should they arise, which is unlikely.
  • Printer delays.  This is always possible with any publication.  Our goal is to release this book on May 5, 2015, and at this point everything is on track for that date.
Perhaps the greatest challenge we foresee is that so many people, looking for an alternative to Selfish, will buy "Unselfish"  and the printer won't be able to keep up!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you feel like us and want to see more stories of unselfishness in our society, then help spread the word.  Join the #UnselfishStories movement.  Share this IndieGoGo campaign.  Like our Facebook page (www.facebook.com/unselfishstories).  Share it with your friends.  The UnselfishStories Movement is growing!

#UnselfishStories

story:
LITTLE OM is a richly illustrated children's book. Published in Sweden in 2013 it was an instant success! This philosophical and funny children's book received wonderful reviews and the fist edition has already been sold out. LITTLE OM has even been compared to Antoine de Saint-Exupéry's classic story "The Little Prince".

Being the author and illustrator of LITTLE OM I am very excited that the book now is ready to reach young (and old) English readers. Please help me raise funding and reach my goal of publishing LITTLE OM April 2015.

Read the great review LITTLE OM received by the Swedish Library Service Book reviewer Kerstin Hagstrand-Velicu;

Little Om is very curious. He asks about everything and one day, he wonders: "Who am I ?" The question takes him out on a perilous adventure. He travels in a time machine he built himself and follow the String of Life to the beginning. Little Om travels through cold darkness, star-spirals and galaxies to meet the first cells, he then swims with fishes, meet dinosaurs, and witness their downfall. Ice Age comes and goes and warmth makes the soil rich in life again.

On a few pages, we follow the evolution of life from the cosmos and the stars to Little Om himself, described with a few rhyming, somewhat absurd verses. Little Om learns that everything is a connected, both in terms of our biological history and all things alive today. The book ends with Om’s dream that all living things fit together like puzzle-pieces. We are all important in our own way and have a part to play in the big picture, life has no real end only shifts its external form.

Lena Magnusson's illustrations are imaginative and a little crazy collages with simple drawings, which completely fits the text funny content. Little Om is a book that successfully invites many questions about the mysteries of life and death and is well suited to read together, adults and children.

story:
10 Thousand Miles
Here in English // Abaixo em Português

Hi!

So my name is João Fernandes (you can learn here how to pronounce my name) and I am a Portuguese writer. Maybe we met before, maybe you have no idea who I am... which is fair, I am not that famous after all (for now muahahah).

Guess what this campaign is for? Yes, I wrote a book. In fact during the entire year of 2014 I locked myself at home, or at cafés and I wrote and wrote and wrote until I could no longer read my own words and started sounding like a retard whenever I met new people. Writing is a very lonely and hard working task, the months added to one another and I kept fully dedicated just to make my dream of publishing a book to be true. The catch was: I HAD NO GUARANTEES THAT A PUBLISHING HOUSE WANTED TO PUBLISH MY BOOK. 

Yeah, I know... I am quite insane.

Still I did not care, I would do it and I would make it. And in the last days of October, actually few seconds before I purchased a one way ticket to Thailand, I read an email that said: "We are interested in..." You get the idea. I literally fell to my knees and started crying, this was everything I wished for during 10 months of intensive work.

What happened next? 

Nowadays publishing houses don't invest any money in unknown authors and I was no exception, so what happened was that I was obliged to buy 200 of the value of my own books, - that literally covers for the all expenses that they have with the publishing of it. 

The not so funny but extremely challenging part?  I did not have that money. I grabbed every cent that I had prepared for Thailand, I moved back to my childhood bedroom in my parents home, I sold clothes, every piece of gadgetry that was not essential, sold my laptop and so forth... So as you can predict I have zero to no funds at all. Another plot twist: I will only receive the funds in a year from now, so no money in my pocket from sold books till 2016! :(

And this is why I need your help.


What I Need & What You Get

I will break it down for you:

  • I need those 4500€ to get back the money invested in the publishing of the book. Plus whatever money I get I will invest in facebook ads, in the traveling expenses of the book tour, in designing more merchandising, in the money I owe to the photographers and designers and in getting the book translated to english.
  • If I don't reach my goals (knocking three times on wood) I will still invest the funds in marketing, book touring expenses and making this book as far and wide known as possible.
But now the funny part, what do you get if you help me? Get ready and make your choice:
  • A badass shirt related to the topic of the book (an American RoadTrip), the design will be announced shortly
  • A signed poster with a beatnik and adventurous photo
  • Signed postcards with an actual picture of the REAL Road Trip
  • A signed book, 2 signed books or even 3 signed books, you choose!
  • A personal writing course and a "how to get your book published" course
  • My assurance that we will write and publish a book together
Not bad ah?!


The Impact

I don't need to say that you will have my eternal gratitude. Do I? For me the Road Trip was not only a trip or a journey, was one hell of an adventure, a legendary piece of living history... And I felt that the only way I could make it honorable was to write a great book based on it.

I essentially gave up everything that dragged me down. I dropped out of a masters just to pursue my writing aspirations. I lived by myself without a fixed wage and essentially on tuna cans and eggs. I dropped everything again to cross a continent from coast to coast without any assurance of success, earning money or anything else besides for the adventure and the greatness of it.
And when I came back I wrote until I got this bad boy alive. Failure for me was not an option and so when you help me you are making this story reach other people who might be yearning for following their dreams and dedicate their life to what really matters: what makes you happy and aligned with yourself.

Challenges

The greatest challenge for me is to get this book translated to English. I will be honest, it won't be easy, I have to sell either 3000 books or find myself an English audience that commits to buy the book. 

So when you select any perk with a book I can do one of these:

  1. Send you the first twenty five translated pages that I can distribute freely OR
  2. You can wait for the book to be translated. Once this happens I will send them ASAP.
So yeah... I cannot promise you that. But what we can do is to make our voices heard. Below I leave a petition for you to sign if you want the book translated to english (which you will want if you selected that perk, I am assuming). Heck, even I want my book translated in english, check out my signature:

http://www.ipetitions.com/petition/10-thousand-miles-in-english

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you for helping me. All the love.

João Fernandes

10 Mil Milhas

 Olá!

O meu nome é João M. Fernandes e sou um escritor português. Se calhar já nos conhecemos, se calhar não fazes ideia de quem sou... o que é justo, afinal não sou assim tão famoso (por enquanto muahaha).
Consegues adivinhar sobre o que é esta campanha? Sim, eu escrevi um livro. Na verdade durante todo o ano de 2014 fechei-me em casa, ou acorrentei-me a mesas de café e escrevi, escrevi e escrevi até não conseguir ler mais as minhas próprias palavras e começar a parecer um atrasado sempre que conhecia novas pessoas. Escrever é uma actividade difícil e solitária, os meses somaram-se uns aos outros e dediquei um ano inteiro apenas a concretizar o sonho de escrever um livro. A parte surpreendente é: EU NÃO TINHA GARANTIAS DE QUALQUER EDITORA EM COMO PUBLICARIAM O MEU LIVRO.
Mesmo assim eu não quis saber, eu ia escrever e ia conseguir ter o meu livro publicado... Já ouviste falar em auto-profecias? Foi assim que nos últimos dias de Outubro, na verdade alguns segundos antes de comprar um bilhete de ida para a Tailândia em que recebi um email com o título: "Nós estamos interessados..." Dá para perceber o que se seguiu, não dá? Eu caí literalmente de joelhos e chorei de alegria como uma criança, era tudo o que tinha desejado durante 11 meses de trabalho intensivo.

O que Aconteceu a Seguir?
Hoje em dia as editoras não investem o seu dinheiro em autores desconhecidos sem garantias de retorno e claro, eu não fui excepção. Assim fui obrigado a comprar 200 exemplares dos meus livros. A parte não muito engraçada mas altamente desafiante? Eu não tinha o dinheiro que me era pedido. Agarrei em todos os cêntimos do porco mealheiro, em todos os euros preparados para a viagem à Tailândia, vendi roupas, aparelhos antigos e voltei à estaca zero... e mesmo assim ainda não tinha todo o dinheiro que precisava. A minha família ajudou-me (a eles a minha eterna gratidão) e como podes calcular neste momento tenho zero euros em meu nome. Outra plot twist, como dizemos na escrita: Eu só irei receber a comissão da venda dos meus livros daqui a um ano, por isso não irá entrar dinheiro no meu bolso até 2016 :( 
E isto é o porquê de precisar da tua ajuda.

O que Preciso & o Que Recebes

Vou partir isto em pequenas partes para ser mais fácil de digerir:

  • Eu preciso de 4500€ para recuperar o dinheiro investido por mim na publicação do livro. Ou seja para saldar dívidas importantes. Para além disso há uma série de trabalho que tem que ser feito que necessita de fundos: anúncios no faceboook, design de merchandising, alojamento do site, a tour do livro e deslocações e por fim no caso de ter que pagar do meu bolso para traduzir o livro para inglês.
  • Se não atingir o meu objectivo (a bater três vezes na madeira) acabarei por investir os fundos em publicidade, na tour portuguesa do livro e a fazer que este livro seja o mais conhecido e lido possível.
Mas agora vem a parte engraçada, o que recebes se me ajudares? Prepara-te e faz as tuas escolhas:
  • Uma tshirt relacionada com o tópico do livro (uma viagem continental pela América do Norte), com o design a ser anunciado em breve
  • Um poster autografado com um tema aventureiro e beatnik
  • Postais autografados com fotografias da VERDADEIRA Road Trip
  • Um livro autografado, 2 livros autografados... até 3 livros autografados!
  • Um curso de escrita pessoal e um curso de "como ter o teu livro publicado"
  • A minha garantia pessoal em como vamos escrever e publicar um livro juntos
Nada mau ah?


O Impacto

Não preciso de dizer que vais ter a minha gratitude eterna, pois não? Para mim a Road Trip não foi apenas uma viagem ou uma etapa, foi uma aventura incrível, uma lenda viva, um pedaço de história que trouxemos à vida... E senti que a única forma honrada de fazer jus a tal aventura era escrever um livro baseado nessa viagem.
Essencialmente eu deixei ficar para trás tudo aquilo que não estava de acordo com aquilo que queria. Desisti de um mestrado para perseguir o sonho de ser escritor. Passei meses em que sobrevivia por semana com pouco mais de 10€. Voltei a deixar ficar tudo para trás e atravessei um continente de costa a costa sem certezas de sucesso, de ganhar dinheiro ou de qualquer outra coisa para além de aventura e da grandiosidade que há nisso.
Quando voltei para Portugal eu escrevi até ter mais de 120 mil palavras prontas para serem entregues às editoras. Falhar era um luxo que eu não tinha, não era uma opção e assim eu preciso da tua ajuda e ao ajudares-me estás a fazer que esta história alcance outras pessoas que desejam perseguir os seus sonhos e dedicar a sua vida aquilo que realmente importa: aquilo que te faz feliz e que se alinha com o que queres.


Desafios

O maior desafio que enfrento neste momento é ter este livro traduzido para inglês e isso só irá acontecer se atingir a meta de 3000 livros vendidos. Pode não parecer muito, mas para um jovem escritor é algo que se parece como o desafio de uma vida. 

Ao público inglês estou a pedir para assinarem uma petição para a editora traduzir o livro, contudo como falas português esse não parece ser um pedido plausível. Contudo, aquilo que podes fazer é enviar esta petição, partilhares esta história com os teus amigos estrangeiros e ver se eles estariam interessados em ler o livro uma vez que fosse traduzido.

Aqui fica o link da petição: http://www.ipetitions.com/petition/10-thousand-miles-in-english

Se realmente gostares do meu trabalho e me quiseres apoiar partilha, gosta e comenta a minha página do Facebook, como também podes ir seguindo o meu Blog em:

http://www.joaomfernandes.com/blog/
http://www.facebook.com/joaofernandesescritor

E é tudo por agora.

Obrigado por me ajudares e todo o amor do mundo para ti.

João M. Fernandes
